channel.title: Survival on Game Vibe
channel.description: Recent content in Survival on Game Vibe

item.title: PIONER
item.description: Game Description Set on the isolated, high-radiation island of Tartarus, PIONER offers a brutal test of survival. This area, previously used to maintain a system of bunkers and laboratories, is now infested with mutants, anomalies and wild animals. The space is divided into zones with PvE and PvP content, as well as social hubs for interaction. Some tasks take place in closed locations, available for both solo and group play. In addition to standard enemies, mini-bosses and powerful raid enemies pose a serious threat, and battles against real opponents take place in special arenas.

item.title: ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL
item.description: Game Description ANGST: A TALE OF SURVIVAL is an atmospheric survival adventure set in a surreal world reminiscent of a frozen limbo. The protagonist wakes up in a secluded hut in the middle of a silent taiga, deprived of any memories of his past. The surrounding reality, known as the Wasteland, is subject to a strict cycle of day and night. Daylight hours provide an opportunity to prepare and gather resources, while as darkness falls, the icy desert becomes filled with hostile entities.

item.title: Deadly Delivery VR
item.description: Game Description Deadly Delivery VR is a cooperative virtual reality horror game in which the main goal is to transport cargo through dangerous, procedurally generated mines. The project involves full physical interaction with the environment and other characters, and the implementation of spatial sound and distance-based voice chat enhances the immersion effect. The process of delivering packages takes place in completely dark tunnels inhabited by various hostile entities. Successfully completing a shift requires couriers to move stealthily, make quick dashes and be constantly vigilant in order to avoid unwanted encounters with dungeon dwellers who can not only steal valuable cargo, but also take lives.

item.title: FEROCIOUS
item.description: Game Description FEROCIOUS is an atmospheric adventure in a lost prehistoric world inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs. The main character learns a story about sea monsters and missing sailors who visit the mysterious fog over the Pacific Ocean. There is a distress signal from a group of investigative journalists that lead the protagonist to the territory of a tropical island located among a foggy cloud. The hero will make his way through the jungle, facing large and predatory monsters.

item.title: Ecopunk
item.description: Game Description Ecopunk is a survival simulator in which the main goal is to restore the destroyed ecosystem of the planet through the unique mechanics of the Mother Tree. Planting ancient seeds can bring life back to devastated lands, and sacrificing defeated foes can bestow valuable blessings. The gradual healing of the climate and the rebirth of nature unlock the full power of this ancient creature, making the settlers stronger. In parallel with landscaping the territories, you will have to arrange your own settlement on the ruins of a former civilization.

item.title: She's Leaving
item.description: Game Description Shes Leaving is about the constant feeling of being stalked and the fine line where the prey and the hunter change places. The project offers to immerse yourself in an atmosphere of horror with a first-person view, where survival directly depends on stealth and ingenuity. Confronting an unrelenting enemy poses a difficult choice: confront the threat head-on or flee for your life, using only a stun gun for self-defense that provides a brief respite.

item.title: Ars Notoria
item.description: Game Description Ars Notoria is a world of fantasy adventure where you are free to explore open spaces and hunt powerful possessed creatures. In this survival RPG, you can defeat the baddies alone or team up with friends to create your own faction of adventurers. Start your journey as a simple poor man, but using the magical ability “Bind Souls”, take control of unique adventurers, each of whom has their own special skills and weapons.

item.title: Hail to the Rainbow
item.description: Game Description Hail to the Rainbow puts users in the shoes of Ignat, a young man navigating the harsh post-apocalyptic world of cyberpunk Russia. Having grown up alone after losing his parents, Ignat knows what he needs to do to survive. His life in this grim reality becomes routine until an unexpected email changes everything, sending him down a path of uncertainty and discovery. In an environment where survival is key, the title invites gamers to explore a chaotic world, piecing together its fragments and uncovering secrets hidden in the ruins of the past.

item.title: Cowboy Life Simulator
item.description: Game Description Cowboy Life Simulator will take players to the Wild West of the 19th century and allow them to master the life of a cowboy, taking care of his family and daily fighting the dangers that the environment presents. The most powerful enemy is hunger. But the hero is not going to put up with everyday life and craves adventure. But the protagonist is not some experienced warrior or the best shooter in the Wild West, so other important farming tasks await him.

item.title: TORMENTOR
item.description: Game Description TORMENTOR takes you on a journey through the twisted mind of a maniac. Take on the role of a ruthless torturer who has taken over an abandoned prison filled with victims sentenced to death. As the game progresses, you will struggle with a developing mental illness that robs you of your memories and causes dangerous episodes of fainting. To keep your mind under control, you’ll work with an organized crime group that operates on the dark web to obtain an experimental sanity-preserving drug for you.

item.title: Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road
item.description: Game Description Monsters are Coming! Rock & Road means constantly fighting, strengthening and collecting resources on a desperate journey to the saving Arch. The basis of all gameplay is the defense of a constantly moving fortified city, which represents the last stronghold of civilization. On his way, merciless hordes of monsters stand in their way, seeking to wipe out this mobile shelter from the face of the earth. Survival directly depends on the ability to repel attacks from both small monsters and giant bosses that threaten the integrity of the tower.

item.title: Morphos
item.description: Game Description Morphos is a psychological horror in which the line between reality and madness is blurred within the walls of a mysterious scientific complex. Exploring the dark underground corridors involves solving numerous puzzles and confronting anomalous phenomena. The space around is constantly changing, turning into intricate labyrinths and distorting the usual perception. Survival will require stealthy movement, competent management of resources and the use of various types of weapons for self-defense from monsters.

item.title: Prologue: Go Wayback!
item.description: Game Description Prologue: Go Wayback! is a brutal survival simulator in which players will have to guide a heroine named Lucy through tens of kilometers of wilderness. The main objective is to reach a remote weather tower located on the opposite end of the map. The path is complicated not only by changeable weather conditions, but also by the need to navigate in space without modern navigation aids. The action takes place over a vast area of ​​64 square kilometers, generated for each new playthrough using machine learning technology.

item.title: Winter Survival Simulator
item.description: Game Description Winter Survival Simulator is a hardcore first-person survival game that offers you to experience the severity of the winter climate. Finding yourself in the snow-capped mountains, there is nowhere to wait for help. You need to rely only on your own strength. Try to survive. Find shelter and wait for rescuers. The action takes place in the mountains of Washington State. With only limited supplies on hand, battle the cold in the wild.

item.title: Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator
item.description: Game Description Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator is a brutal survival test where an old RV becomes the only refuge in the world after an unknown disaster. This vehicle requires constant attention, forcing gamers to personally repair it, search for spare parts in abandoned buildings and refuel the tank to continue driving. Every bolt found and engine fixed gives a temporary sense of security in the middle of the deserted American wilderness.

item.title: Village of the Curse
item.description: Game Description Village of the Curse is a depressing first-person horror game that puts you in the shoes of a journalist investigating the dark secrets of an isolated settlement. The hero will have to survive in an atmosphere of constant fear, because unpredictable and ruthless creatures are hiding in the shadows. Every meeting with these distorted entities becomes a test of strength. Exploring eerie locations, including an abandoned church, a witch’s house and a haunted cemetery, is fraught with mortal danger.

item.title: Driving Life
item.description: Game Description Driving Life is a detailed simulator that offers you to master more than 40 types of transport in the setting of rural America. Players will explore a vast open world of 16 km², where they can not only complete work tasks, but also buy and sell 16 unique houses. Of particular interest is the mechanics of restoring 6 project cars, parts for which are scattered throughout the island. In addition to managing finances, it is necessary to constantly monitor the basic needs of the character: hunger, thirst, sleep and even boredom, which significantly increases the level of immersion in what is happening.

item.title: Lost Paws
item.description: Game Description Lost Paws is a survival simulator in which you take on the role of a stray dog ​​named Doggo and explore a large open world faced with the mysterious disappearance of all your pets. Personalization of the protagonist is implemented through an equipment system that allows you to find and try on a variety of accessories. There are dozens of items scattered throughout the world, including hats, glasses and even shoes, which are stored in separate inventory slots.

item.title: THRASHER
item.description: Game Description THRASHER is a psychedelic arcade odyssey where music, visuals and the process itself are woven into a single transcendental stream that immerses you in a state of flow. The journey takes you from primeval darkness to the heights of celestial bliss, culminating in an intense showdown with a cosmic infant deity. Control the magnificent space eel to gracefully glide and dash across stunning alien worlds in a desperate race for survival.

item.title: Kentum
item.description: Game Description Kentum is a sci-fi adventure where the death of the protagonist is only a temporary setback thanks to cloning technology. The main task is to revive civilization, relying solely on automation and our own strength. The basis for survival is the creation of a self-regulating environment, where automated mechanisms and conveyor belts turn the shelter into a full-fledged production complex. Here, coal is produced from bones and wood, and ingots are smelted from scrap metal, gradually building a complex system to provide themselves with everything they need in a world devoid of people.

item.title: Skopje '83
item.description: Game Description Skopje ‘83 is a tactical shooter with a comic book visual style, immersing you in the dark atmosphere of an alternative history of the Balkans. The only island of relative safety in a city engulfed in chaos is the DOM bus. This mobile base not only serves as a means of navigating dangerous streets, but also as a workshop for upgrading your equipment. Inside it, you can modify your character and save valuable loot collected during forays.

item.title: Service with a Shotgun
item.description: Game Description Service with a Shotgun plunges you into an absurd reality where retail rules apply even during a zombie apocalypse. The main task becomes not only survival among the hordes of the undead, but also high-quality service to the eccentric customers lining up at the half-empty shelves. While the living dead are wandering outside the window, a real drama is unfolding inside the store: you need to speak quickly, shoot accurately and build defensive structures in order to survive the next work shift.

item.title: The Last Caretaker
item.description: Game Description The Last Caretaker is a story of survival in a world where hostile mechanisms and a constant lack of resources force you to act methodically. The gameplay is based on the exploration of abandoned structures towering over the endless ocean. Each rusty tower or silent dock becomes a source of valuable materials obtained by dismantling the remains of a former civilization. Not only tools and weapons are created from the recovered scrap, but also complex energy networks.

item.title: Whiskerwood
item.description: Game Description Whiskerwood is a city-building simulator where industrious mice have to found a colony under the yoke of feline overlords. Space on the islands is limited, so the development of the settlement is directed not only in breadth, but also deep into the rocks and up to the skies. Verticality becomes a key element, forcing the construction of complex networks of conveyors, elevators and pipelines to transport resources and provide residents with everything they need.

item.title: Deadcam
item.description: Game Description Deadcam is a psychological horror game where the feeling of fear is fueled by the ability to see yourself through the eyes of a ruthless stalker. The main character finds himself locked within the walls of an abandoned rural house along with Margot, a former film crew colleague who has turned into a deadly threat. Her head-mounted camera continues to work, broadcasting in real time her distorted face and every step that brings her closer to her victim.

item.title: Generation Exile
item.description: Game Description Generation Exile offers an atypical take on the city-building simulation genre. Instead of developing new territories and endless mining, we have to find a balance in a closed system. Progress is to create closed cycles where biological waste is transformed into nutrients or raw materials for bioplastics using anaerobic reactors. Each step in this step-by-step project requires careful planning of resources, since they cannot be replenished from the outside, and the goal is sustainability, not endless growth.

item.title: Rubble Eats The World
item.description: Game Description Rubble Eats The World is a shooter with an advanced physics model, where almost any object on the level is subject to destruction and subsequent absorption. After completing the main story campaign, additional opportunities open up for gamers. The built-in sandbox editor allows you to design your own testing grounds and share them with other players. For those looking for a real challenge, there is a difficulty setting system.

item.title: Jester: A Foolish Ritual
item.description: Game Description Jester A Foolish Ritual - a descent into despair, where the only way to salvation is the completion of an ancient sacred ritual. Within the walls of a gloomy medieval castle, fallen knights have awakened, resurrected for one last mission - to drive out the monstrous Jester that haunts them in the dark corridors. Freedom awaits only those who can find the hidden runes and open the treasured ritual chamber.

item.title: Super Movie Tycoon
item.description: Game Description Super Movie Tycoon gives you the opportunity to create a unique cinematic world where every aspect of filmmaking is under your control. Creating a highly efficient film production pipeline begins with careful planning of professional departments and the development of new land. As director, screenwriter and producer, you personally create all the details of the future masterpiece, using your boundless imagination to conquer Hollywood heights. The entire process, from the initial idea to the end credits, becomes the embodiment of your creative vision.

item.title: Dark Moon
item.description: Game Description Dark Moon is about a near and bleak future. This time, things have become very bad for humanity, not thanks to aliens or nuclear war, but because of the Sun. A storm is raging on the star, which has disabled all equipment on Earth and provoked unrest there. On the Moon, things are even worse: the sun’s rays destroy any objects on the earth’s satellite that they manage to reach.

item.title: 1998: The Toll Keeper Story
item.description: Game Description 1998 The Toll Keeper Story - a simulator in which every day at the workplace turns into a test of the strength of moral principles. As Devi, a pregnant toll checkpoint guard, you must make life-changing decisions that determine who gets to travel further and who gets left behind. Document checks and vehicle inspections take place against the backdrop of general chaos engulfing the fictional country of Janapa. Society collapses under the yoke of a financial crisis, protests erupt in the streets, and trust in government evaporates, turning routine work into a series of moral dilemmas.

item.title: Outbreak Island
item.description: Game Description Outbreak Island takes place on Erlsen Island. A mysterious virus that came out of nowhere began to drive the inhabitants of a small region crazy. The governments of nearby countries agreed on a secret operation so as not to expose the disaster. The territory was isolated from the rest of the world. The main character, Howard Chapman, secretly arrives on the island to find out the true reasons for the incident.

item.title: Space Chef
item.description: Game Description Space Chef is a thrilling open-world adventure where you must hunt down strange alien creatures and plants to cook them into delicious dishes and deliver them to the most dangerous corners of the galaxy in your homemade spaceship. In this unique combination of exploration, action and cooking, you will use your culinary skills and weapons to overcome challenges and become the best chef in the entire galaxy. Your kitchen just exploded, ruining all your hard work and hopes, but don’t despair!

item.title: Beneath
item.description: Game Description Beneath is a dive into the chilling depths of the ocean, where experienced diver Noah Quinn must face the horrors generated by sinister experiments. In the cramped corridors of underwater research stations, a desperate struggle for survival unfolds. Ammunition is running low, and you have to confront not only the ruthless mercenaries of the Omnium corporation, but also the nightmarish Lovecraftian creatures that have awakened in the Arctic abyss.

item.title: The Horde Wants You Dead
item.description: Game Description The Horde Wants You Dead is a fast-paced top-down shooter that plunges you into a desperate fight for survival against countless hordes of enemies. The main task is to confront thousands of ruthless opponents, using an extensive arsenal and tactical maneuvers. Survivors must collect coins from defeated enemies, which are exchanged for supply crates containing character upgrades, new weapons, or increased firepower. The gameplay is based on constant movement and adaptation to different types of enemies.

item.title: MISERY
item.description: Game Description MISERY throws up to 15 players into a cooperative survival scenario in a nuclear disaster zone. The characters take on the roles of PMCs guarding a research institute in the Republic of Zaslavie before the conflict escalated into nuclear war. A siren sounds, signaling an incoming bomb and providing a 60-second window to grab supplies before retreating to the bunker. After the strike, the daily routine consists of forays into the procedurally generated Exclusion Zone to collect resources from ruined cities and abandoned military bases.

item.title: OLAPU
item.description: Game Description OLAPU is a test for a well-coordinated team, challenging raid bosses whose mechanics are reminiscent of large-scale battles in MMORPGs. Defeating opponents like Guardian Seraphina or Empress Elisera will require not only perfect knowledge of attack patterns, but also impeccable coordination. Each successful foray into the Valley of Elisera is rewarded, allowing you to unlock permanent upgrades, legendary gear with semi-random stats, and even new characters for future runs.

item.title: Super Fantasy Kingdom
item.description: Game Description Super Fantasy Kingdom is an exciting and addictive game where gamers will experience an exciting adventure filled with strategic gameplay and endless possibilities. With a randomly generated map and a hero at your disposal, you embark on each journey with the goal of protecting your kingdom from the relentless hordes of monsters. This survival roguelike offers a huge amount of options, allowing you to recruit over 100 different units, each with unique abilities and synergies.

item.title: VEIN
item.description: Game Description VEIN is a journey into a world that has experienced the collapse of civilization, where survival depends on the ability to adapt to constantly changing conditions. The change of seasons and random global events continuously transform the landscape and influence tactics. Here, every sound matters, as opponents controlled by artificial intelligence are able to track down survivors, relying on sight, hearing and smell. This forces you to be constantly on alert, because even abandoned buildings can harbor a mortal threat in the form of mutated zombies.

item.title: Pizza Deathlivery
item.description: Game Description Pizza Deathlivery is a risky food delivery mission in a city shrouded in ominous fog. The streets of the metropolis, where almost all the inhabitants have turned into monsters, have become a deadly labyrinth. The only hope for survivors suffering from hunger is a brave courier, whose task is to deliver all orders before midnight. Failure means not only the boss’s displeasure, but also certain death in the foggy darkness.

item.title: Becastled
item.description: Game Description Becastled is an indie real-time strategy game that was created over a long period of time due to many changes that the developers made. The game uses an isometric camera standard for the genre, which allows you to see all controlled territories and instantly react to events both in peacetime and during military operations. The project has only a single-player mode with a built-in list of achievements, in which rewards are given to the gamer for certain successes during the passage.

item.title: Cut That Wire
item.description: Game Description Cut That Wire is a project in which four hostages have to find themselves in a confined space, where each of them has an explosive device attached to their chest. In this tense situation, they need to identify the traitor hiding under the guise of an ally, because any mistake could be the last. One of the participants, known as the Engineer, has critical information - he knows one of the safe wires.

item.title: Bermuda Survivor
item.description: Game Description Bermuda Survivor is an adventure in which the mysterious Bermuda Triangle becomes a survival arena where every step affects the environment. The protagonist will not only have to fight off hordes of enemies, but also actively change the world around him. Resources collected during forays are used to open hidden paths, restore abandoned buildings and activate ancient mechanisms. In this way, exploring hand-crafted islands with their fixed landscapes turns into meaningful transformation of locations, allowing you to find more efficient routes for future visits.

item.title: Escape from Duckov
item.description: Game Description Escape from Duckov is an action-adventure game that immerses you in a world where the main character, a little duck, has to survive and fight for his life. Having awakened from a strange dream, the protagonist finds himself in a harsh reality full of dangers and hostile creatures. To survive, he needs to explore the surrounding areas, constantly in search of useful supplies and resources. Every foray outside the shelter turns into a risky undertaking, because in the event of death, all the equipment found will be irretrievably lost.

item.title: Go To Sleep
item.description: Game Description Go To Sleep is a psychological horror that plunges the protagonist into a nightmare from which there seems to be no way out. Events unfold within the confines of one room, where a young teenager finds himself locked with his fears, embodied in the form of a ruthless demon. This creature, born of guilt and regret, tirelessly pursues the hero, trying to plunge him into eternal sleep forever. The only salvation is a paradoxical action - close your eyes and fall asleep in order to speed up the passage of time until the saving sound of the alarm clock.

item.title: Beacon of Neyda
item.description: Game Description In Beacon of Neyda, a failed robot uprising has left the world in ruins. The last handful of humanity are trying to leave lifeless lands patrolled by hostile automata. Players will have to guide survivors through abandoned areas, building temporary fortifications to protect against mechanical threats. The main task is to organize an exodus from the dead wastelands. Each location offers a new challenge in the ongoing struggle for the future of the remaining people, forced to survive in a world under the rule of their former servants.

item.title: The Lacerator
item.description: Game Description The plot of The Lacerator revolves around an 80s porn star named Max, who, along with a film crew, ends up in the lair of a psychopath. The erotic scene turns into a desperate battle for life, and the main task is to escape from the maniac’s tangled hideout. Gamers will have to guide the hero through a dangerous environment, where the lines between intense horror and black comedy are deliberately blurred.

item.title: Swamp Keeper
item.description: Game Description Swamp Keeper is a tale about a little keeper who is destined to protect a sacred swamp from the encroachments of invaders. Armed only with a bow, this nimble lizard must repel the onslaught of the enemy army of Ho, seeking to seize the valuable resources of the swamps. The fate of the native lands depends on accuracy and tactical calculation, because the enemy, using iron and fire, has already approached the very heart of the swamp sanctuary.

item.title: The Legacy
item.description: Game Description The Legacy is a co-op survival horror game set in a dark tale of a family curse in a deserted town. Events unfold years after in 1990, Grandfather Molfar, a local sorcerer, refused to sacrifice one of his descendants to the dark forces of the forest. To save his grandchildren, he sent them from their hometown of Svetlograd to Kyiv, but this act doomed the entire area to death and desolation.

item.title: Deathground
item.description: Game Description Deathground is a first-person survival horror game aimed at cooperative play. The story centers on people fighting for survival among bloodthirsty dinosaurs. There are different modes available in which you need to team up with three more players, trying to break through the jungle and military bases, fighting against powerful ancient lizards. The heroes will have to survive on the killing field, where every enemy poses a serious threat.

item.title: Dream Abyss: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dream Abyss Survivors is a spontaneous role-playing adventure that immerses brave heroines in a surreal dream world, where they must fight back endless waves of nightmarish creatures. Each foray into the depths of the nightmare becomes a unique challenge thanks to an extensive progression system. Gamers create a variety of fighting styles by combining 65 skills, 17 variable characteristics and 23 power-up cards. Countless hordes of monsters and powerful bosses are destroyed by one of four selectable protagonists, each of whom has a unique set of abilities and a special style of combat in this vibrant anime fantasy.

item.title: Deadswitch Combat
item.description: Game Description Deadswitch Combat is a fast-paced 2D side-scrolling shooter that immerses fighters in fast-paced tactical battles across a variety of maps. The project offers many competitive modes, including classic team clashes such as Team Deathmatch and Capture the Flag. In addition to them, more specific scenarios are also available, for example, Demolition with the installation of a bomb or Headquarters, where it is necessary to capture and hold strategic points.

item.title: Aztecs The Last Sun
item.description: Game Description In Aztecs The Last Sun, the player becomes the ruler of Tenochtitlan, a great state that can win the whole world. The user relies on many tasks, as the head of his own power. He has to develop a city, increase military power and improve the quality of life of citizens. Having taken the control over the Aztecs, you will need to go through the three great centuries, to dominate in the nearest territories and write new pages in world history.

item.title: Celestial Empire
item.description: Game Description Celestial Empire offers to go to the Han dynasty when the Chinese empire was one of the most powerful in the world. Here, the user is given the role of the Governor of the province, who was personally chosen by the emperor. Now, everything must be done in order to make this place better and provide a high standard of living for people. And given that there are a lot of ways for the development of the structure, you can not limit yourself to a single strategy, but try different options.

item.title: Megabonk
item.description: Game Description In Megabonk, the gamer opposes the endless waves of creatures on randomly generated maps. The main task is to withstand the onslaught for as long as possible, using the mechanics of the slasher and a third -person shooter. With the strengthening of the Horde, survival depends on the destruction of opponents and maneuvering in space. The purpose of each stage is to find and defeat the location boss, opening access to a new, more difficult zone.

item.title: Arctic Awakening
item.description: Game Description Arctic Awakening is an adventure first -person game, the plot of which is served episodically. Once in the vastness of the harsh Arctic, surviving after air flipping. Traveling to travel in the company of a protagonist and drone with pumped artificial intelligence. Together, the heroes need to go on a journey in which they need to find the second pilot in order to get out of snowy lands.

item.title: Superhero Simulator
item.description: Game Description The Superhero Simulator has to protect Goldpine - a city faced with an increase in crime. The player’s main task is to patrol streets, suppress robberies, save civilians and enter into an open battle with villains. Each successful act reveals new abilities, gradually increasing the power of the character. This gameplay cycle is combined with the need to lead an ordinary life, forcing to constantly look for a balance between two different roles.

item.title: Voyages of Nera
item.description: Game Description Voyages of Nera offers gamers the role of Echo, a descendant of the long -disappeared defenders of the world. The main task is to cross the magical ocean to confront monstrous creatures and the awakening of scattered spirits. This world, negligently, is filled with ancient ruins and original biomes located on its islands. Players can combine up to 10 people for joint swimming around the seas or go on a trip alone.

item.title: Fata Deum
item.description: Game Description Fata Deum is a strategy game with simulation elements, inspired by old-school games about gods who rule a settlement. Shape the city and its inhabitants by terraforming, building houses and increasing the population of people by creating them in your image. What will your society be like? Majestic and highly moral, or will you be able to persuade them to debauchery and demonic essence? All your whims are reflected in the game world.

item.title: Misty Judgment
item.description: Game Description Misty Judgment begins with the awakening of the protagonist, qi and, from a nightmare in a strange reality without clear memories. Unable to confirm his own personality, he investigates a series of murders filed in the video format with real actors. The main task is the search and analysis of evidence, the comparison of facts and the calculation of the criminal. Any solution affects further events, and the future of the protagonist depends on the deductive abilities of the player.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description It’s Time Your Majesty is a strategy in which the fate of the whole dynasty falls on the shoulders of the ruler, where each decision is made through the choice of cards. In the role of the monarch, it is necessary to rule the state, trying to achieve prosperity and protect subjects from numerous threats. On the way to greatness, both external enemies and internal problems that require a balanced approach will stand.

item.title: Machick 2
item.description: Game Description In Machick 2, a magical chicken faces off against countless hordes of frogs in chaotic arenas. The key task is to survive under the continuous onslaught of enemy waves in conditions of dense fire with a view from above. Each attempt offers a unique set of challenges and opportunities, requiring the gamer to constantly adapt. The main goal in these unpredictable scenarios is to destroy the legions of amphibians and defeat the powerful bosses who command them.

item.title: Ammo and Oxygen
item.description: Game Description Ammo and Oxygen sends an expedition to Voydregula 6, a planet where communication with the new colony has been completely severed. The purpose of the mission is to find out the reason for the silence and determine the fate of the settlers. Gamers will explore procedurally generated locations, moving through abandoned stations, canyons, swamps and permafrost. Each foray into these dangerous zones becomes an attempt to restore the picture of the events that led to the collapse of the settlement and to confront the hostile inhabitants.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid Δ: Snake Eater
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Solid δ: Snake Eater is a remake of a classic stealth explosion, telling the story of the origin of the legendary soldier Big Boss. The action unfolds in 1964, during the Cold War, and the main character Naked Snape penetrates the Soviet Union to stop the nuclear threat and resist his former mentor Boss, who went over to the side of the enemy. There is a rich storyline with memorable characters, such as Ozelot, Eve and The End, which throw various challenges.

item.title: Beyond the Map
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Map begins with a shipwreck on the outskirts of the known seas, setting the player an immediate task of survival in a mysterious territory. The development of the character is complete without a class system: increasing the level of skills opens up new basic abilities. The search for rare folios with spells around the world provides access to incredible forces, additionally determining the capabilities of the hero.

item.title: Ways of Alchemy
item.description: Game Description In Ways of Alchemy, the player begins his journey in a secluded hut, where he uses card mechanics to create powerful elixirs from many ingredients. The final goal is to build an entire alchemical empire on the basis of a modest shack, using intelligence and tactical thinking. To do this, you will have to look for ancient recipes and recruit adventurers, constantly avoiding the close attention of the Inquisition.

item.title: Funguys Swarm
item.description: Game Description Funguys Swarm places the fighter in a burning forest to confront the Fire King’s army using forest weapons and unusual abilities. There is a variety of heroes to choose from, each with unique skills for different combat approaches. The player’s main goal is to withstand continuous attacks from fiery minions and mutated vegetables, whose intensity increases over time. Survival in the top-down arena requires constant maneuvering and timely elimination of these threats.

item.title: Stone Simulator - Just Be a Rock
item.description: Game Description Stone Simulator - Just Be a Rock offers you to live the life of one motionless boulder over huge periods of time. The key is to simply exist, observing the evolving world in a continuous cycle of days, nights and changing seasons. The stationary facility endures dynamic weather events, from summer heat and spring rains to severe winter snowstorms. This unique gaming experience unfolds from a static third-person perspective, emphasizing passive contemplation rather than direct action.

item.title: Cleanfall
item.description: Game Description Cleanfall puts a player at the head of the harvesting robot, the only function of which is to maintain cleanliness in the house. This simple task becomes a planetary mission after one techie brought the world closer to his sun. The cataclysm that happened covered the surface with a whirlwind of dust and death, making a restraint of order impossible. In order to bring cleanliness in his house again, the mechanism must first correct the whole world, going down to the underground layers of the planet to start his work.

item.title: GuntouChables
item.description: Game Description GuntouChables sets from 1 to 4 players in the role of prepared survivors in the conditions of post -apocalypse. The main task is to conquer ground territories at hordes of hostile, continuously evolving mutants. These creatures constantly invent new methods of eliminating heroes, bringing fresh threats with every battle. The gameplay is tied to the confrontation of this dynamically changing enemy force. Promotion in the plot is tied to the execution of missions for which Upcrates are issued with currency and perks to increase the chances of survival.

item.title: Grand Empire 2: Portals Apart
item.description: Game Description Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart is a survival and crafting experience built around traversing magical portals. As a sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel, this project develops the concept of a directed adventure. The journey takes the player through a series of fantasy worlds, where each portal opens up access to new resources. Development follows a linear technology path, forming a structured single-player campaign instead of an open-world sandbox where the gamer determines his own goals.

item.title: Bum: Revenge
item.description: Game Description Bum: Revenge is a first-person crime simulator centered on the life of a homeless person. The plot begins after the protagonist is beaten by his wife’s lover, Dennis. Waking up in the hospital with divorce papers, the hero spends 6 months on the street, becoming addicted to alcohol and drugs. Players enter this world with nothing, exploring the squalid environment of the city’s back streets. The main goal is to survive in new conditions and take revenge.

item.title: Heartworm
item.description: Game Description Heartworm is a classic Survival Horror with elements of a psychological thriller. A girl named Sam with cut legs leads a closed lifestyle and does not want to leave her home. From the very beginning, the game hints that due to difficult childhood a young woman began to have problems with the psyche. Once she receives a video cassette with strange contents. Having looked at the record, the heroine suddenly comes to his senses in a completely different place.

item.title: Prospector
item.description: Game Description Prospector begins with arrival at someone else’s world, having only a set of tools at its disposal. The primary task is to collect the planet’s resources for the construction of the basis for the base. Players build structures, explore the environment, and then establish automated production lines. For construction, everything is used, from primitive materials to unknown alien substances found on the landscape. Gradually, a simple avantopost turns into a complex object with an optimized working process.

item.title: Grounded 2
item.description: Game Description Grounded 2 returns players to a reduced state in a much larger world. The new environment was the playground, now representing a spacious area from man -made structures and overgrown nature. Survival makes it necessary to create weapons and armor, as well as the construction of defensive bases to confront local threats. This title allows you to explore the open territory alone or in cooperative online mode. The main goal is to search for hidden secret secrets in the struggle for existence in this environment.

item.title: Achilles: Survivor
item.description: Game Description Achilles: Survivor takes players into a world of intense, non-stop action where survival depends on smart decisions, quick reflexes and strong strategy. You are immersed in a scenario where thousands of enemies are trying to stop you. Your character develops, gaining more strength and capabilities after each attempt. This cycle of death and rebirth becomes the basis of your survival story. As you progress through each wave, your goal is clear: survive and become stronger for the battles ahead.

item.title: FUMES
item.description: Game Description FUMES plunges you into the heart of a chaotic wasteland world where vehicular combat reigns. Users take control of customizable vehicles, equipping them with weapons and armor to survive the unforgiving desert landscape. The title brings an old-school feel to car combat, drawing on the style of classic rally games with driving mechanics that reflect a time before flashy graphics and complex controls. It’s fast-paced, straightforward, and has genuine tension.

item.title: Ascent of Ashes
item.description: Game Description Ascent of Ashes is an immersion in a post-apocalyptic colony where your task is to build and defend a base, survive and explore a world teeming with dangers. Here you will find real-time battles with raiders, aliens and other factions, where you need to use stealth tactics and outwit the enemy. But the base itself also requires attention: grow crops, tame alien creatures, introduce technologies and strengthen walls against enemies.

item.title: Dinosaurs Dominion
item.description: Game Description Dinosaurs Dominion is a single -user adventure focused on territorial conquest. The player has to control the dinosaur for battles, evolution and gradual seizure of control over the environment. Progress in each passage is earned through the study of the world and victory in battle. The defeat returns the creature by the beginning of his journey, which is a key feature of Roguelite design. The choice of 14 accessible species, from agile scouts to massive predators, provides different approaches to this survival cycle.

item.title: Grimshire
item.description: Game Description Grimshire represents a script with a spreading plague that threatens an isolated mountain settlement. The player arrives here after the absorption of his hometown with chaos, getting a chance for a new beginning on the local farm. Its role consists in managing the economy, collecting forest gifts and ensuring a permanent reserve in the cellar. The main task is to prevent bloating of food in preparation for the arrival of the disease, which requires competent supplies to maintain everyone’s life.

item.title: WolfQuest: Anniversary Edition
item.description: Game Description WolfQuest is a wolf simulator. For it they give you a chance to run around Yellowstone National Park in the USA. He will visit Mount Amestist, Slough Creek and the Lamar Valley. The user starts the game in the northern part of the famous nature reserve. The area of ​​the open world reaches 50 square kilometers. There is a change in time of day, seasons and weather conditions.

item.title: Kingdom Ascension
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Ascension puts the player in the lord position with the task of creating his own possession in an empty plot of land. The initial stage includes a systematic collection of provisions and materials - basic elements for any settlement. These assets then go to the construction of the first buildings to create a stronghold in the world. Subsequently, the focus shifts the recruitment of military detachments that form an army to protect native lands and spread the influence of the outside.

item.title: The Wandering Village
item.description: Game Description Once in The Wandering Village on an infected planet, people have no choice but to poison the back of a giant creature that can move in the process. The urban planning simulator is made in a post -apocalyptic setting and offers to lead a small society that saved, settling on the essence and gradually rebuild the new world. Having moved to the virtual universe, the user observes as some toxic substances that appeared due to mysterious plants, quickly spread on the ground by giving out toxic disputes.

item.title: Nelumbra
item.description: Game Description Nelumbra puts the player in the role of the bearer of light, character who fell into a temporary loop without memories of the past. The main task is to fight for the truth of one’s own existence, and the price of this is unknown. Survival is built on the use of rhythmic car autocat and jerks as the surrounding light is extinct, which steadily pumps stress with each action.

item.title: Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors
item.description: Game Description Dark Fairy Tale: Dreamland Survivors puts a player under the control of Pinocchio, a puppet who has trapped in a hostile and distorted space of nightmares. The character moves around this world by controlling one hand, while the system is automatically introduced to creatures from rethought fairy tales. The promotion depends on the collection and absorption of more than 100 different forbidden dreams of dreams, each of which modifies offensive and defensive capabilities.

item.title: Chinese Frontiers
item.description: Game Description Chinese Frontiers is an atmospheric immersion in the time of ancient China, where users will be able to feel the life of a simple resident of the village. The game is a simulator of life where you have to take under the management of the employee, which is working on the construction of a great Chinese wall. Gamers will be able to test various types of crafts of that time, and will also monitor the character indicators, giving him food, water and rest in time.

item.title: Len's Island
item.description: Game Description Len’s Island is an open world adventure, which is the construction of a base with the possibility of a pharmacy, craft, research and battles. Each player is able to build his own house of dreams, care for crops and simply explore the secrets of the island. If you manage to find a sword, then you can go to more dangerous adventures, fighting with numerous enemies guarding the treasures.

item.title: Thrive: Heavy Lies the Crown
item.description: Game Description Thrive: Heavy Lies The Crown is an exciting medieval fantasy urban planning strategy that will check your leadership qualities and make you make a difficult choice to ensure the survival and prosperity of your kingdom. In this game, the fate of your people largely depends on the decisions you have taken, and the path you have chosen - favor or tyranny - will determine your heritage. The will is your weapon, you must build and strengthen your city, form the land and develop your kingdom with the help of a deep technological tree.

item.title: NITRO GEN OMEGA
item.description: Game Description NITRO GEN OMEGA imagines a world where machines dominate the landscape after humanity’s lost war. The surviving people huddle in cities built on giant pillars, so teams of mercenaries are forced to travel through dangerous wastelands. The player takes control of one of these squads, based on a flying ship to carry out tasks for the supply of resources and technologies. The task is to explore this world, lead a squad and control a combat mech.

item.title: The Alters
item.description: Game Description The Alters is a science fiction adventure that immerses in the world of choice and consequences. Imagine yourself stuck on an unfriendly planet, where there is no one to rely on, except for your own ingenuity. This is the intriguing plan of this innovative game, which immerses in the world of parallel lives and alternative realities. Going on this journey, you take on the role of Jan Dolsky, a worker who made an emergency landing on a foreign world and is now facing the problem of survival and salvation.

item.title: Zombie Graveyard Simulator
item.description: Game Description Zombie Graveyard Simulator features a dual operation cycle: during the day, players handle burials and cremations, tend to graves, satisfy visitor requests, and tend to crops. As night falls, attention turns entirely to defense against the attacks of the walking dead, which requires the erection of barriers to preserve the results of the day’s work and one’s own salvation. This change of activity forms the core of the process.

item.title: Neuroshima Hex
item.description: Game Description Neuroshima Hex is a post -apocalyptic tactical competition adapted from the board game system. The course of events is built on strategic solutions on the hexagonal field. Opponents use various detachments, technologies and their special skills for the implementation of military plans. Mechanics implies the arrangement of chips and determine the moment of their action. In Neuroshima Hex, players fall into the world, surviving the decline of nature, where there is a struggle for resources.

item.title: Elden Ring Nightreign
item.description: Game Description Elden Ring Nightreign is a separate part of the Universe, where the action takes place in Limgrava, the very first district with the open world, presented in the original series. However, this is not the usual version of Limgrave. The world here is procedurally generated, which means that each passage offers unique experience. Users fall into the game with their team of two people, each of whom has their own abilities.

item.title: Zombie Cure Lab
item.description: Game Description Zombie Cure Lab - this is an opportunity to plunge into a colorful sandbox-laboratory, in which gamers have to put a variety of experiments on zombies. Scientists find a way to begin to control monsters that will be able to turn into hybrid creatures, half-dead people. Now you have to find a full medicine to calm and cure all the injured humanity from the disease of zombie. Users will build walls and fences to protect complexes with scientists.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Survive the Fall
item.description: Game Description The disaster in Survive The Fall occurred in 2023, when a huge asteroid crashed into the ground. Most of the population died, and those who were in distant places in the world survived. The player moves to the post -apocalyptic environment, where it is necessary to engage in the construction of settlements, using tactical and strategic elements. An extensive and open world includes many good lands, forests or destroyed cities.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition puts the player in the role of Major Degtyarev, an intelligence officer sent to the cover under the cover. Its task is to find out the causes of the failure of the military operation and the disappearance of the detachment. Events unfold in the Pripyat region, where everything is permeated with dangers: anomalies, radiation, hostile groups and an unstable situation. In Stalker: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition, each action has consequences.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition transfers a gamer to the role of a mercenary named Scar, forced to survive among warring groups, unstable abnormalities and deadly emissions. The action takes place to the events of the previous title of the series, demonstrating the origins of the territorial split in the zone. The basis of the mechanics is the system of wars of fractions - with its help, the user is able to change the alignment of forces between armed formations.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition transferred gamers to the alienation zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, where anomalies, armed groups and mutants act outside the law framework. Movement in this territory depends on food supplies, the level of radiation, the number of cartridges and relations with other characters. Plot tasks can be performed in different ways using research, shootings and dialogs. The environment is a constant danger, which requires attention to details, and not following the finished routes.

item.title: Of Life and Land
item.description: Game Description Of Life and Land provides users with the opportunity to try themselves in the colonization of lands, creating small settlements. Gamers will be engaged in expanding their own regions and trading with neighboring factions. A full-fledged simulation is taking place in the world, where it is necessary to erect buildings and provide the villagers with work, gradually putting the town in order. It is necessary to extract valuable resources in order to erect the desired buildings and improve the quality of life for the subordinate people.

item.title: Blacksmith Master
item.description: Game Description Blacksmith Master is an exciting simulator in which you can control your own blacksmiths, starting with mining and precious stones to the design and sale of finished products. Your task will be tortured everything - from weapons and armor to instruments and kitchen utensils - to earn on your craft and become a real master of blacksmithing. Here you can lead your own medieval blacksmith and you will control the entire process: the extraction of resources, their processing and production and sale of finished products.

item.title: Cubic Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Cubic Odyssey is a large -scale project with an open setting that combines the elements of research, survival and creativity. Users move according to procedured planets, interact with a variety of ecosystems and fight with the upcoming force known as red darkness. In the universe there are planets with a changing environment, ancient ruins and settlements inhabited by NPC fraction. Each place is complex tasks and opportunities that require strategic resource management and adaptation.

item.title: Dino Path Trail
item.description: Game Description Dino Path Trail shows the world where dinosaurs survived to the era, similar to the wild West, setting a person to survive in this altered land. The main goal includes the search and salvation of a stolen sister through the intersection of various lands full of dangers. The chances of surviving are strongly dependent on the solutions and actions of the player as part of the structure of this action-rowlaine, where it is necessary to repulse predators, hostile people and elements.

item.title: Revenge of the Savage Planet
item.description: Game Description Revenge of the Savage Planet throws the player into alien locations. The character turns out to be thrown on the edge of the space by the former corporate employer. The central task is to move around alien territories, collecting resources and finding improvements to organize home and revenge the corporation, guilty of its position. The study of the area includes the detection of hidden objects and the interaction with the environment.

item.title: Rift Riff
item.description: Game Description Rift Riff throws gamers into the cracks between worlds to battle monsters and collect valuables. Gameplay is built around tower defense, requiring careful placement and control of structures. Before the start of the mission, you will have to determine a set of defense structures and then build them on the map at the designated points. A key aspect of Rift Riff is selecting defensive structures to counter enemy types and their attacks.

item.title: Knights of the Crusades
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Crusades sends a player during the first crusades, where a lone knight will come to begin. It is ahead to go to the foundation and management of the holy order, choosing the Templars or creating their own fraction. The process combines real -time elements with the construction of settlements and management within the sandbox. You have to solve problems related to war, religious influence, diplomacy and strategic planning.

item.title: Ratopia
item.description: Game Description Ratopia is an original strategy that challenges genres thanks to a unique combination of survival, sandbox and a city construction simulator. Get ready to plunge into a huge and exciting world that will captivate you with its endless possibilities. Here you have to create your ideal city and manage it, but be careful, because every resident has its own characteristics and wealth that you must take into account. No one said that it would be easy, but with the right selection of jobs and services, you can make your residents happy, and your economy is prosperous.

item.title: Kingdom's Deck
item.description: Game Description Kingdom’s Deck presents a card-based experience that combines city building with nightly repelling attacks. Gamers will become rulers of the lands, faced with the task of expanding their personal possessions and at the same time ensuring the safety of the inhabitants from enemy attacks. Gameplay focuses on deck building and the strategic placement of these assets to control and develop a power. The main actions alternate between the construction of structures during daylight hours and the organization of the defense of fortifications at nightfall.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: Oppidum
item.description: Game Description Oppidum takes the player to the island of Insul, where they will have to master the mechanics of survival alone or in a team of up to four people. The characters find themselves in a land of widespread decline due to a deep-rooted corruption that has fractured the local society. Key gameplay elements include setting up a central camp, systematically gathering supplies scattered throughout Insul, and navigating its varied zones.

item.title: Darkwater
item.description: Game Description Darkwater gives gamers to command a submarine, which ended up in an ice trap on a foreign planet. This is a cooperative horror, designed to work from 1 to 4 people. Survival implies navigation in a hostile environment, clashes with enemy courts and underwater life forms, as well as an active search for resources necessary for further work of submarine. Success depends on the implementation of the necessary actions for existence in underland conditions.

item.title: Escape the Mad Empire
item.description: Game Description Escape the Mad Empire is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler, promising a mixture of tactical battles and base control. Players collect a detachment of heroes whose survival depends on strategy and resourcefulness. The combat system requires an attentive approach. Each move, each action has weight. Using the area, shelters and objects becomes the second nature, when users move around the battlefield with high rates. The Title is not amenable to simple classification, combining the elements of Roguelike, RPG and Base-Building into unique experience.

item.title: Laser Tag Massacre
item.description: Game Description Laser Tag Massacre puts the player in the script in the spirit of slasers of the 1980s. Events unfold on the night of Halloween, when a group of 5 friends is going to celebrate a holiday in a large abandoned gym. This dilapidated structure is located in the remote part of the Campinas, Brazil, which isolates the characters from any external assistance. Their plan for the usual match in the laser tag is sharply interrupted by the appearance of a hostile presence, shifting the focus from resting for self -preservation.

item.title: Forever skies
item.description: Game Description Forever skies is an atypical survival in the world of post -apocalypse, where the player will become the captain of the airship. Unfortunately, the protagonist is the only crew member, but even this does not reduce the number of his problems. After all, he still needs food, which is practically no in the air with the exception of rare birds. And the technique tends to break, and it requires constantly replacing old details.

item.title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds
item.description: Game Description RuneScape: Dragonwilds introduces gamers to Ashenfall, the forgotten continent of the RuneScape universe where dragons have awakened. This open world experience challenges 1-4 players to survive together or alone. The gameplay is based on collecting resources, constructing buildings, developing skills and creating things. The main task is to hunt down the dragons and fight their Queen. Survival in RuneScape: Dragonwilds is constantly complicated by the threat of dragons that roam the lands.

item.title: Crashlands 2
item.description: Game Description Crashlands 2 Returns you to the crazy world of Wuanop. Flux Deibs, all the beloved intergalactic trucker, was again in a difficult position. This time forget about the transportation of goods. It is about reunite with old friends and getting new, eccentric. But these are not only calls to the old cosmic friends. We are talking about the connections that you create. Friendship with Voanop’s colorful character opens the door, and literally.

item.title: Hollow Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hollow Survivors is Rogue -Like Dungeon Crawler, in which gamers take on the role of one of the last rational Hollow in the world captured by terrible monsters. Then the users have to fight with the endless waves of enemies, rising to the tower, which is under the control of the ominous cult. Along the way, you will find a variety of weapons, improvements and synergistic effects that will help you survive and survive.

item.title: Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days
item.description: Game Description Into The Dead: Oour Darkest Days transfer the player to Walton City, Texas, 1980 sample, covered by a zombie epidemic. The gamer has to lead a detachment of surviving through the dying metropolis. The key task of the gameplay is to move the wards between temporary shelters, taking care of their condition. It is necessary to find provisions, make objects and repulse constant danger from the dead who filled the streets.

item.title: Sandwalkers
item.description: Game Description Sandwalkers is a roguelike focused on step-by-step exploration of dangerous lands. The Mka tribe periodically sends troops into Fiti, a weather anomaly that divides the Uwando tribes and makes it difficult to survive outside of safe zones. The goals of such expeditions are to establish diplomatic contacts, explore and mark territories captured by monsters and pirates, and grow a new tree city as a refuge. Successful completion of the task requires the caravans to send the collected information back through the crystospheres carried by the beetles.

item.title: Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder
item.description: Game Description Roman Triumph: Survival City Builder can be attributed to the simulators of the colony and real -time strategies. There are also survival elements in the indie project. He has high reigree due to the random generation of cards. The gamer here is offered to establish a settlement and help it develop to a full -fledged city. At the same time, it is necessary to monitor the needs and mood of the townspeople.

item.title: The Last of US Part 2 Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Last of US Part II Remastered goes to the PC and transfers the narrative experience of the Naughty Dog to a new platform. Players fall into a world where survival intersects with personal revenge, following the main characters of Ellie and Abby along the interconnected plot lines. The game takes place in the post -pandemic landscape and transfers participants in territories, transformed infection and human conflicts. Jackson, Wyming, serves as an initial background on which the characters are in the framework of the survivor community.

item.title: Emissary Zero
item.description: Game Description Emissary Zero is a title in which a group of people under cover of darkness enters an unfamiliar building. With minimal tips from a remote manager, they are looking for something called the moon, hoping to leave him intact. The structure is unpredictable, it shifts as they move, forcing them to navigate in space, which refuses to be understandable. Each sound alone becomes a potential threat; Together, coordination becomes both a tool and a risk.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beyond Horizons abandons the linear path and throws gamers into a vast, ever-changing world. Buckle up and get ready to explore - procedurally generated landscapes make every game unique. Leave your comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel across vast deserts, lush forests, and any kind of road (or lack thereof). But this is not just a sightseeing trip. Drive Beyond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that remain to be unraveled.

item.title: A Merchant's Promise
item.description: Game Description A Merchant’s Promise places the player in a stylized medieval setting focused on commerce and transportation through the direct physical handling of objects. The journey begins with the role of the Worthless Merchant, tasked with manually moving cargo using a physics-based system. There is no usual equipment here; Each object must be lifted, carried and placed, creating a constant risk of dropping or even throwing luggage. Promotion includes increasing Merchant Status, which directly affects communication and potential profit in the title’s economy.

item.title: Voids Vigil
item.description: Game Description Voids Vigil is an arena with an Autoboy in the Rogue -Lite style, where the action never stops. Gamers will have to clean the one who flooded the arena of the hordes of robots armed only with automatic weapons, drones and many special abilities. Title maintains interest, offering a variety of modes and complexity settings, which allows you to always find new tests. As you advanced, users should competently dispose of their koga - the key resource, which is used in stores that appear throughout the game.

item.title: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a survival simulator that immerses in the very heart of the ancient forest. Title takes users to a world where nature is not only living, but also has its own mind. Here, gamers build a house, overcome daily difficulties and interact with a rich ecosystem full of wild animals, magical creatures and unpredictable forces. Every day brings new difficulties associated with survival: from hunger and health management to solving problems with the weather and seasons.

item.title: R.E.P.O.
item.description: Game Description **R.E.P.O. **- this is a online cooperative in the genre of Horror, in which gamers are united to collect valuable objects surrounded by terrible dangers. In this intense adventure, up to six gamers can immerse it, each of which is equipped with a tool based on physics, designed to capture and transport objects. What is the difficulty? Take care of the cargo, moving through the enchanted spaces, and not allow something to break along the way.

item.title: Dawnfolk
item.description: Game Description In Dawnfolk, the action of which takes place in a world covered by darkness. As a ruler of the kingdom lost to the shadows, you must restore and protect your people. With the help of a mystical creature, Luer, you must navigate in the darkness and work on the restoration of light on Earth. In the center - research, resource management and decision -making when you restore your kingdom from scratch.

item.title: Mind Over Magic
item.description: Game Description The Mind Over Magic offers the player to become the master of the magic school located over a dangerous underground maze. You have to design, build and manage all aspects of your school, from classes to dormitories, from gardens to laboratories. You also have to train your students with various magical skills, such as lost lasso, production of potions, growing plants and necromancy. But your school is not a safe refuge.

item.title: Foundation
item.description: Game Description The urban planning simulator-Foundation-will allow you to plunge in the medieval era, build a whole settlement, make people happy at the expense of unique structures, as well as understand the history of the construction of houses and churches, on which there was a lot of emphasis due to constant rivalry of religious directions. We will build houses and other structures with smart brushes. They will allow us not to exceed authority and put only those buildings that will meet environmental norms and criteria.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Diddy
item.description: Game Description Diddy begins with a mission to destroy a dark party held in a private estate. Players in the Company of Eminam and 51 Centers must stop the owner’s atrocities and stop the meeting. The main task is the salvation of Justin B, who is in the territory after the accumulation of a state fraud. The detachment confronts the army of Selebri, acting as a guards, ready to defend the estate and its owner.

item.title: Airborne Empire
item.description: Game Description Airborne Empire. Want a city-building adventure with a twist? This game throws you straight into the clouds, tasking you with building and managing a city that floats among them. Think SimCity and sky pirates and exploration. The basis is strategic planning and resource management. You will have to keep your city afloat, in the literal sense of the word. Every decision you make affects how well your air metropolis functions.

item.title: My Summer Car
item.description: Game Description My Summer Car is a life simulator of a Finnish, a 19-year-old boy who lives in a dacha in picturesque forests. His relatives on vacation in Tenerife, the whole house, and most importantly, garage, at his disposal. Created on Unity, thanks to the flexibility of this engine, and it became possible to add so much mechanic, which are below. Your main occupation will be the restoration of the ancient Satsuma AMP car made on the basis of a real car - Datsun 100a.

item.title: Make Good Choices
item.description: Game Description Make Good Choices puts gamers in the awkward position of having to solve an unnervingly simple task: getting home. What seems like a simple journey down a quiet street quickly turns into an intense task of survival. Each step along the way presents a new set of obstacles, often unexpected, forcing gamers to constantly evaluate their choices. Although the story is based on a walk down a single street, the tension that builds throughout the game is palpable as a seemingly mundane environment turns into something much more sinister.

item.title: Anime City
item.description: Game Description Anime City transfers gamers to a bright 3D virtual Tokyo, inspired by anime culture. Title combines the mechanics of the visual novel and sandbox, creating an interactive environment, focused on everyday life, social interactions and school experience. Users stand in the place of a high school student, moving along a dynamic, fictitious city landscape, interacting with the characters, exploring key places and participating in various events. Title offers many ways to plunge into this detailed city - from clubs after lessons to public events and part -time work.

item.title: Heat Death: Survival Train
item.description: Game Description Heat Death: Survival Train drops you into a frozen wasteland where surviving is like winning the lottery. You will travel on your trusty train - a rickety metal beast that is your only hope against the piercing winds and all the nastiness that roams this desolate world. Every decision you make could be the difference between seeing another sunrise or turning into ice cream. A train is not just transport, it is your home on the rails.

item.title: Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy
item.description: Game Description Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy will dips you with your head in full intrigue of the new dragon. Forget about hard classes - here you pave your own path. Each decision by you determines your journey on this richly detailed kingdom. Imagine that you have to reveal a secret conspiracy that can destroy the fragile world of the new dragon. That is what awaits you. Each of your quest is a thread in a grand tapestry, and the choice you make can rewrite history.

item.title: Urban Strife
item.description: Game Description Urban Strife takes place in a post-apocalyptic world, and the gameplay is presented in the style of old school TBS. The main character lives in a dangerous environment, where every resident does everything for his own benefit. Resources are running out, there are no jobs, and most kill and rob to survive. The player can enter into alliances by choosing 1 of several factions, automatically becoming an enemy of the remaining factions.

item.title: Chrysalis
item.description: Game Description Chrysalis is a roguelike strategy game whose gameplay is divided into two contrasting phases. Initially, the protagonist, in the guise of a disembodied spirit, explores procedurally generated locations, inhabiting friendly creatures and collecting resources. After the timer expires, the calm garden atmosphere is replaced by an ominous one, and waves of aggressive monsters appear on the map. From this moment, the defense stage begins, requiring the use of all accumulated forces and tactical skills to repel attacks.

item.title: Caves of QUD
item.description: Game Description Caves of QUD-A game in the sling genre with an unusual mixture of styles, such as: fantasy (ordinary swords and bows as a weapon of murders, are combined with magic and marvelous creatures), post-apocalypse and science fiction. A feature will be the choice of a protagonist before the start of each new preservation with his bonuses. The mutant receives unlimited scope for various modifications, by obtaining changes in his DNA, in other words, mutations, among which there is a second heart, second head, wings, claws and much more.

item.title: The Thing: Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Thing: Remastered returns to Antarctica, continuing the story of the 1982 film. Nightdive Studios resurrects the 2002 horror third-person shooter with a sequel to Outpost 31. Players play as Captain J.F. Blake, commander of a US Special Forces rescue team sent to investigate the aftermath of a scientific expedition. Gameplay centers on facing off against shape-shifting alien creatures in a challenging environment. Team management becomes one of the core mechanics in which players must navigate complex interpersonal dynamics and potential contagion among team members.

item.title: Unknown Tapes
item.description: Game Description Unknown Tapes immerses you in a primitive nightmare. Developed by Traviteam Games, this horror game uses found personnel to place you in the very center of the modern world in which dinosaurs occurred. Remember the “Jurassic Park”, where all safety measures were torn and replaced by rusty nails, and the heart freezes in tension. Here you are not a hero with a flamethrower, but prey. Each rustle of foliage, every creak of floorboards is a potential death.

item.title: Black Dragon Mage
item.description: Game Description Black Dragon Mage is an action adventure game set in a dark and dark fantasy universe. Gamers step into the shoes of a powerful magician, making their way through procedurally generated landscapes filled with all sorts of creatures from the depths of hell. From the very beginning, the user finds himself in a world where danger lurks around every corner. There is no shortage of challenges here, and each encounter requires quick thinking and reflexes.

item.title: Necromorphosis
item.description: Game Description Necromorphosis is a merciless world where survival requires becoming the embodiment of death to your enemies. The main goal is to ascend to the throne of skulls and proclaim yourself the King of the Undead, but the path to it lies through fierce battles with countless monsters. The pretender to the throne will have to challenge powerful rulers who jealously guard their possessions. Only by defeating these formidable opponents and taking their power can you prove your right to dominance in this inanimate hell.

item.title: Space Architect
item.description: Game Description Space Architect is a simulator where gamers have to become in place of the manager of the space station. The main goal is to build, maintain and expand the space station, simultaneously coping with the difficulties of resource management and interstellar trade. In the beginning, users are faced with a serious financial burden - a huge debt to a powerful megarporace, which forces them to make complex decisions on how to get income and stay afloat in endless cosmic voids.
