item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a first-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic world. The events of the game will develop in the exclusion zone formed as a result of the disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. In 2006, a new catastrophe occurred, which led to various physical, chemical and biological processes, creating many anomalies, artifacts and generating a large number of mutants. The gameplay is a classic FPS with elements of a role-playing game, immersive sim and horror.

item.title: Rogue Command
item.description: Game Description Rogue Command is a strategy with elements of a bagel and a card game. You need to collect resources, form a unique deck of cards and fight against robots. When gathering an army, you need to study the enemy’s tactics in order to deal a crushing blow to him. While exploring locations, you need to obtain resources to build buildings and hire units. There are factories, auxiliary buildings, turrets and special weapons of mass destruction.

item.title: Space Trash Scavenger
item.description: Game Description Space Trash Scavenger takes place in a future where humanity has reached for the stars and survival means using what others have left behind. Here, gamers take on the role of scavengers operating in a galaxy littered with the rubble of an ancient conflict. The journey begins with a space drill - a multi-purpose node floating among the remains of abandoned ships, forgotten outposts and asteroid fields. This is not just a shelter, but a factory, equipped with critical systems for agriculture, defense and waste processing - all necessary to turn interstellar waste into something valuable.

item.title: Bullet Runner
item.description: Game Description The dynamic shootouts inBullet Runner show the adventures of a pixelated man who is forced to resist against a crowd of evil opponents. The game is a top-down action shooter where you have to fight with various opponents. The project is filled with fast and active gameplay, where users can test the speed of their reaction to current events. You’ll have to move around the map and shoot enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons.

item.title: Catizens
item.description: Game Description Users in Catizens have to develop the city of cats. Players will be able to watch the activities of cute and fluffy animals, helping the kittens build a big and beautiful city. During the passage, users will have to create working groups of different characters that can argue or come into conflict with each other. Misunderstandings will have to be cleared up to increase productivity and improve the quality of life for the entire settlement.

item.title: Void Sols
item.description: Game Description Void Sols places gamers in a minimalistic, top-down world that redefines the essence of soulslike gaming. The world is a huge, abstract labyrinth in which users will have to explore its depths and survive in harsh conditions. From the very beginning, you find yourself in a dark and confusing maze, where there is no map, no directions - only an inexorable desire to move forward. All you control is a triangle-shaped character, and there are no words to explain why you are here and what your goal is.

item.title: Mirthwood
item.description: Game Description Mirthwood is a fun medieval fantasy sandbox game that combines the charm of a life simulation with the thrill of an RPG. It offers gamers the opportunity to create their own adventure in a new country, escaping their war-torn homeland. The game offers two main paths: settle down and build a farm, trade with other cities and start a family; or explore a huge open world and fight bandits, monsters and other dangers.

item.title: Odd Remedy
item.description: Game Description Odd Remedy invites users into an action-packed multiplayer adventure where teamwork and survival go hand in hand. The story takes place on an isolated island overrun by mutated spider monsters, and your mission? Escape with your fellow prisoners. Although you start out as prisoners, the island’s wild dangers offer a strange freedom as you scavenge for supplies, pillage towns, and destroy enemy-infested caves. The island itself becomes your playground, filled with challenges, obstacles, and the constant threat of the Black Fang Corps lurking around every corner.

item.title: Sofie: The Echoes
item.description: Game Description Sofie: The Echoes is an adventure game that immerses gamers in an exciting storyline. The main character, Sophie, goes on a quest, guided by personal interests. In search of her husband and son, she goes through a world full of difficulties and trials. In this world, the boundaries between reality and echoes of the past are blurred. Every moment in the adventure feels weighty as users follow Sophie’s path through treacherous landscapes and emotional turmoil.

item.title: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
item.description: Game Description Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse is an open-world role-playing game that immerses gamers in a post-apocalyptic environment. The story centers on Delta Team, led by Major Pan, as they navigate a world devastated by a virus. Users are faced with a vast landscape where exploration becomes necessary. They will collect resources, fish and create equipment necessary for survival. The environment presents gamers with numerous challenges and pits them against various enemy forces.

item.title: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner
item.description: Game Description Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner is a first-person horror game that draws users into the disturbing world of a roadside diner at night. The plot centers on a young man who takes up the night shift at this creepy diner, coincidentally ending up on the night of a blood moon. But this isn’t just any ordinary night shift - soon after the diner’s doors close, the usual routine begins to turn into something much darker.

item.title: Sulfur
item.description: Game Description Sulfur is an adventure adventure, in which the elements of the first -person shooter are combined with traditional role -playing games and mob. Gamers take on the role of a character, moving around a complex world, filled with problems and capabilities. The gameplay is focused on battles and research, forcing users to think strategically, faced with various enemies. Each collision requires a different approach, which makes the adaptation key.

item.title: Dark Hours
item.description: Game Description Dark Hours is a cooperative horror game for survival created by Piece of Cake. Here users are sent to a robbery, which sharply turns into the unknown. Locked in an auction house, they face a demonic being, which violates their plans. What began as a mission to theft of valuable things quickly turns into a battle for survival. The atmosphere changes when gamers understand that now their goal is to get out alive.

item.title: The Dead Await
item.description: Game Description The Dead Await immerses users in gloomy adventures, where it is necessary to survive during the zombie apocalypse. The users will have to participate in cruel step-by-step battles with walking dead, gradually gathering their own deck with cards-abilities. It will be possible to configure and pump the characters in the detachment, engage in the study of the open world, to extract resources, trade with secondary NPS and manage its own caravan for survival.

item.title: Eden Crafters
item.description: Game Description Eden Crafters throws glove in the hands of survival and automation lovers. In this cooperative adventure with the open world, players will turn to turn a hostile planet into a hospitable refuge for humanity. Think about this as a space project of reconstruction - harsh conditions, fluids of the house of dreams. Task? Overcome the unpleasant habits of the planet and build a new house for humanity. Imagine radioactive zones and insidious landscapes are not the best real estate.

item.title: Ghostbane
item.description: Game Description Ghostbane invites users into a realm filled with the eerie and inexplicable, offering a cooperative horror experience designed for groups of one to four people. Gamers set out to find and capture the ghosts that haunt the city, creating an environment for teamwork and strategy. In this game, users take on different roles, each of which contributes to the paranormal investigation mission. Communication is important; sharing observations can mean the difference between success and failure.

item.title: Diplomacy is Not an Option
item.description: Game Description InDiplomacy is Not an Option the player becomes a feudal lord in the Middle Ages. The main character is going through a midlife crisis. Every day the protagonist comes up with hundreds of ways to improve his own economy, how to properly lead his subjects and competently develop the city. He lived like this for a long time. He was tired of monotonous and meaningless intellectual stress. New adventures in the life of the central character begin when hordes of monsters began to attack settlements, and the townspeople rebelled together.

item.title: The Last Plague: Blight
item.description: Game Description The Last Plague: Blight is a survival simulator in the open world, which is generated randomly. The user controls one character and watches what is happening from above. The camera is tied to the hero. It is allowed to rotate. Indi-project uses medieval setting with a light fantasy raid. The events of the Blight game occur in a world where there is a filth. This is the name of a mysterious disease.

item.title: Start Over
item.description: Game Description Start Over is a multiplayer survival simulator set on a desert island, providing an immersive experience. You have to build a base, make the necessary equipment and defend against waves of enemies. The game features a realistic and dynamic environment where you need to adapt to constantly changing weather conditions, hunt animals, collect resources for survival and engage in trading items to earn money. As you explore the island, you can discover hidden secrets such as secret caves, ancient ruins, and even military camps.

item.title: DreadHaunt
item.description: Game Description DreadHaunt is a 4v1 multiplayer horror and deception game in co-op and PVP. Here one of the users becomes possessed and turns into a ghost, and the rest must survive. The action takes place in a country plunged into chaos as a result of mass demonic possession. Gamers take on the role of an E-Class field agent tasked with securing, containing and protecting the source of evil to investigate and save the country.

item.title: City 20
item.description: Game Description City 20 is not an ordinary survival game where you need to search for resources. Of course, there is the usual wasteland after a disaster, the constant struggle for survival, the excitement associated with finding decent scrap metal. But the title adds a twist to the story - your choices rewrite the rules. Every decision you make sends ripples through this broken society, pushing NPCs in new directions and changing the course of events.

item.title: Frostpunk 2
item.description: Game Description Frostpunk 2 is a continuation of the survival game, which is based on management and construction. The events of the game take place 30 years after the catastrophe that covered the Earth. Now the planet has experienced severe cooling and people are suffering from constant frosts. In the urban planning simulator, you are asked to try on the role of a hero who, in the process, must lead an entire metropolis and take care of the well-being of local residents.

item.title: Bloody Hills
item.description: Game Description Bloody Hills invites gamers into a gripping survival horror scenario set within the walls of a remote forest camp. Here, calm gave way to horror, turning the camp area into a chilling place where danger lurks at every step. At the center of the story is a relentless killer, known only by the nickname Hiker, who wanders through the forest with sinister intentions. As night falls, the atmosphere changes, creating an oppressive heaviness that seems to tighten around users, intensifying the fear that grips them to the core.

item.title: Seed of Heroes
item.description: Game Description Seed of Heroes is a game where the player controls a detachment of warriors, moving through numerous worlds with a view of the top. The goal is to defeat opponents and earn the right to enter the halls of Valhalla. During this trip, it is necessary to participate in the battles of the Bullet Heaven genre, to resist many enemies and collect treasures to strengthen their power. Progress is built on Roguelite elements, discovering after several attempts to access new heroes, objects and other game capabilities.

item.title: Trail of Ayash
item.description: Game Description The world ofTrail of Ayash is based on the myths and legends of the inhabitants. An open game location allows you to freely explore the area and learn more about the life of Native Americans. The player will encounter various tribes competing with each other, participating in diplomacy, organizing wars and expansion. The main character is Ayash, a respected man in his own faction. One day, a close person frames Ayash, and after that he is expelled from the tribe.

item.title: Panic In The Woods
item.description: Game Description Panic In The Woods is a survival and loot horror game that immerses gamers in a chilling woodland environment. The game can be played solo or in co-op with up to four gamers, playing as boy scouts lost in a haunted forest. The goal is simple: survive the relentless pursuit of the monstrous creature. Communication and strategy are of utmost importance. Users use walkie-talkies to coordinate their movements and exchange important information.

item.title: Hive Jump 2: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hive Jump 2: Survivors is a sci-fi role-playing adventure game with action elements. In this adrenaline-pumping sequel to the acclaimed action-platformer, you’ll find yourself the only survivor of your squad, stranded on an alien planet. Armed with only your guns and your trusty jetpack, you set out on a mission of revenge. Here you have to fight relentless waves of killer insects. What is your goal? Destroy these swarms of aliens and collect their valuable entrails.

item.title: Satisfactory
item.description: Game Description Satisfactory is an open-world first-person adventure where you build industrial buildings, explore, and fight. Explore a new planet alone or with other users. Build huge structures and do whatever you want in assembly line paradise. You are an employee of FICSIT Corporation. Players can build wherever they want. Expand production in all directions, install factories in the mountains, forests or plains. Mine natural resources found all around you. Build complex networks and transport routes, automate all mechanics, without forgetting about safety.

item.title: Hit of Chernobyl
item.description: Game Description Hit of Chernobyl immerses users in a post-apocalyptic environment where survival is of paramount importance. Finding themselves in an area contaminated by an unspecified disaster, gamers take on the role of an adventurer. He must navigate a landscape full of dangers, not only from the environment, but also from other characters. The world is populated by marauders, journalists and thrill seekers, each with their own motives. Finding unique artifacts becomes the main task, requiring users to overcome a landscape replete with difficulties.

item.title: Don't Stare
item.description: Game Description Don’t Stare is a stealth platformer that weaves together gameplay and storytelling in a thoughtful and engaging way. You enter the world as an introvert, navigating an environment filled with extroverts who want to make small talk, invite you to a party, or just chat about their day. However, the introvert has his own mission, much more personal than just making new acquaintances. You are not here to join the crowd, but to reunite with old friends who, for unspoken reasons, have grown apart.

item.title: Star Trucker
item.description: Game Description InStar Trucker imagine yourself speeding through space, a lone trucker in a galaxy of endless possibilities. Welcome to a game that combines the spirit of the open road of American trucking with the vastness of space. You are not just a driver, you are the captain of your destiny in a space suit. What is your mission? Transport cargo, search for salvaged items and communicate with other truckers across the galaxy.

item.title: Unstoppable: Breakout
item.description: Game Description Unstoppable: Breakout is an adventure game in which gamers find themselves in a chilling complex, leaving them alone and confused. Guided by the voice of a colleague, the protagonist, a researcher, must navigate dark and mysterious corridors, battling inhuman experiments and uncovering hidden secrets. The game is an intense mix of strategy and combat, requiring careful resource management and precision in every strike. The gameplay of Unstoppable: Breakout is an exciting roller coaster ride with challenging combat and boss battles.

item.title: DEATH IN UNISON
item.description: Game Description DEATH IN UNISON is a co-op survival adventure game set in an isolated rehabilitation institute on Corton Island. Here gamers will have to survive in the fight against some of the most dangerous criminals in the world, many of whom have supernatural powers. Users must perform their prison duties alone or with a partner, relying primarily on radio communications to navigate the treacherous environment. Gameplay in DEATH IN UNISON revolves around completing administrative tasks and protecting yourself from hostile prisoners.

item.title: ENDLESS DAYS Z
item.description: Game Description ENDLESS DAYS Z immerses gamers in a desolate, post-apocalyptic world devastated by DeltaVirus-7. As the leader of a group of survivors, you must overcome treacherous obstacles, collect vital samples, and confront hordes of the undead as you desperately search for a cure. The gripping narrative and intense gameplay make the game appealing to fans of survival horror and action games. The gameplay of ENDLESS DAYS Z is based on exploration, combat and resource management.

item.title: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria
item.description: Game Description The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is an adventure game in the Lord of the Rings universe, the events of which develop in the world of Middle-earth during the Fourth Age. In the game you can meet characters from the original work. For example, Gimli appears at the beginning of the story. He leads a company of dwarves, leading them to Durin’s Doors. The plot centers on the dwarves, whose task is to reclaim Moria and restore the entire kingdom of Khazad-dum under their rule.

item.title: Core Keeper
item.description: Game Description Going on an adventure inCore Keeper, you are immersed in an atmosphere of the unknown, requiring exploration on behalf of an archaeologist who wants to discover as many new relics and ancient artifacts as possible. Waking up in an unfamiliar area that resembles a cave, the protagonist will have to fight through a variety of monsters and obstacles that impede progress in order to achieve his goals. Taking control of the main character, who finds himself in a pixel world filled with the spirit of adventure and precious treasures, you have to survive and explore the dangerous environment.

item.title: Endzone 2
item.description: Game Description Endzone 2 throws you into the thick of the post -apocalyptic world. Humanity died, and you remained to collect fragments - literally. Each decision that you make as if you can send your scattered colony by the line. Lack of resources? Eat. Danger to the environment? Do not hesitate. Ruthless raiders eager to steal your lunch? Undoubtedly. This is not a simple walk. This is the management of your nascent civilization.

item.title: Wild West Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Wild West Dynasty takes place in 1800s America. The player’s task is to build his own ranch, providing himself with wealth and food. Over time, other settlers, workers and friends will join the main character. Each minor character has their own qualities, characteristics and mannerisms. Many of them will turn out to be bandits, and only the gamer can decide who is sent to the gallows. Having become determined, the central character set out to build a Wild West dynasty, moving further across the Pacific region of America.

item.title: Terminus: Zombie Survivors
item.description: Game Description Terminus: Zombie Survivors is a gloomy journey that takes gamers to the setting of the zombie apocalypse. It is ahead to survive among dangerous mutants, making their way through a variety of locations. The main task for the hero will be the search for the place of terminus, the last stronghold of mankind. In the game there are elements of Rowlaik that create random situations on the map. It will come out to compete with starvation, cold temperature and aggressive opponents.

item.title: ODD Realm
item.description: Game Description ODD Realm is a game that combines both the strategy and the survival simulator. The player will have to take on the role of the leader of a small settlement and provide residents with the necessary resources, houses, as well as protect their subjects from bloodthirsty enemies and dishonest bandits from a high road. The variability of the development of the plot provides the gamer with wide opportunities for the construction of the city of his own dreams.

item.title: UBOAT
item.description: Game Description UBOAT is a unique simulator of submarine control during the Second World War. Observe and take direct part in the life of German submariners in the midst of war, when at any moment their refuge could turn into the place of their death. Survive in the open world and control all processes occurring on the submarine. Your players must be well-fed and energized so that your gameplay is not doomed to failure.

item.title: 7 Days to Die
item.description: Game Description In7 Days to Die you will need the ability to loot, kill other players, take loot, build buildings, craft items, shoot accurately and keep track of time, because in the open world there is a night in which zombies and other undead sharpen their attention . A horror first-person shooter that combines city building, multiplayer, survival, tower defense and character leveling in an RPG style. Despite the fact that a severe epidemic has struck the world, you will be able to kill animals to take their meat and skin.

item.title: Pigromance
item.description: Game Description Pigromance tells about the efforts of one pig to avoid turning into a food product, this is a story about the escape contrary to the established expectations. The action starts on a farm, where the piglets were previously behind the fence, in the usual environment. Over time, this design of the content succumbed, initiating the mass departure of animals from the agricultural limits in search of an alternative to their prepared role.

item.title: Into the Radius 2
item.description: Game Description Into the Radius 2 throws users headlong into a chilling world. Whether you prefer solo exploration or thrilling squad adventures, Radius promises danger and secrets in equal measure. A project that will allow gamers to experience the disturbing atmosphere first hand. Forget about fancy graphics and pomposity. Into the Radius 2 boils it down to the bare bones of survival. Radius himself is a character, a mysterious and hostile force dictating your every move.

item.title: CONSCRIPT
item.description: Game Description CONSCRIPT is a horror game set in the First World War. It’s 1916. The player controls a French soldier who moves through the trenches, collecting various supplies and solving many puzzles to help him overcome the thorny and winding path. The protagonist is trying to survive in extreme conditions, being involved in one of the most brutal conflicts in human history. The game mechanics combine classic horror with modern survival games.

item.title: Acre Crisis
item.description: Game Description Acre CRISIS transfers players in 1992, placing them in the AKR area in the jungle of the Amazon. The Brazilian Military Police Brigade is going to this area to investigate a series of deaths caused by wild animals, as well as reports of a meeting with cryptids. Upon arrival, the soldiers were in direct confrontation with a group of hungry dinosaurs, which was very different from their initial task.

item.title: Norland
item.description: Game Description Medieval setting in** Norland** shows interactive stories that will happen to the royal family. Players will manage the birth that controls the city. We will have to observe the activities of ordinary workers, peasants, slaves, soldiers and criminals. Each character has needs, as well as a unique character. Users will have to distribute instructions for family members in order to put order in the urban district. We will have to take power into your own hands, dealing with different economic or military spheres.

item.title: The Crust
item.description: Game Description The Crust is a survival with elements of the economy, where the player will build a whole small town with highly limited resources almost without the possibility of replenishing them. In order to grow at least something on such a surface and provide your people with the proper amount of food, you will have to try hard. However, with proper management, this is still quite possible. The main character is the head of the space company, which was decided by the first to colonize the moon.

item.title: ASKA
item.description: Game Description ASKA is a 3rd person action role-playing game in which you can build an unforgettable Viking settlement and survive together with your inhabitants. Your ships land in an unfamiliar world that is constantly changing and full of secrets. You will have to fight, build, repair, fight, grow crops and swim the waves in order to survive the fight against an ancient enemy in the cold winter… You will have to create a self-sufficient tribe, work, create, fight, hunt and lead the people to prosperity.

item.title: Workers and Resources: Soviet Republic
item.description: Game Description InWorkers and Resources: Soviet Republic you have to lead a fallen country and turn it into the strongest republic, making it a superpower with the happiest inhabitants who have built world progress. The urban planning strategy will show you a country that is very similar to the Soviet Union. You accept it broken, plundered, ruined. There is absolutely no money in the treasury, and people have no opportunity to raise territories, plant crops, go to work, simply because there is no money even for food, but you understand that all this can be corrected.

item.title: Bodycam
item.description: Game Description Bodycam throws you headlong into a hyper-realistic multiplayer battlefield. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this all-new shooter promises a next-gen experience that will redefine your expectations. Teamwork is key here. Every bullet counts, and the victory or defeat of your squad depends on your every decision. Forget playing Rambo. Bodycam requires strategic thinking and coordinated attacks. Team up with your teammates, map out a plan of action, and use your arsenal to outmaneuver your opponents.

item.title: Empires of the Undergrowth
item.description: Game Description Empires of the Undergrowth is a simulation and real-time strategy game with unique mechanics. In the game you will have to manage a colony of ants. Starting to play as one ant, you will hunt, manage builders, and create a unique hive. The design of your hive will determine whether your colony can survive in this harsh world. Why harsh? Throughout the game you will face various obstacles. First of all, these are your enemies!

item.title: Taora: Survival
item.description: Game Description Taora: Survival throws you headlong into a huge open world. Forget about sightseeing, this is pure survival. You’ll navigate a treacherous landscape, dodging threats around every corner. Building a defensible base and managing resources are your top priorities, a harsh reality check, right? But the problems go beyond the elements. This world is teeming with nasty enemies, so you’ll need sharp tactics to both fight and strengthen your defenses.

item.title: Genome Guardian
item.description: Game Description Genome Guardian transfers gamers to the environment, where a microscopic becomes a scene for a high -octane action. This is a game where the usual meets the unusual, offering the world filled with microscopic organisms, some of which are harmless, while others are far from the case. A distinctive feature is that it is based on the mixing and selection of DNA nucleotides to create bio -weapons, which serves you the main protection from the hostile environment.

item.title: V Rising
item.description: Game Description Waking up inV Rising, the hero as a vampire must hunt for blood, while simultaneously avoiding direct sunlight. The survival slasher film puts you in the shoes of a bloodsucker who wakes up in his own castle and must regain his possession and authority while operating in a vast open world full of secrets. Here you have to conquer the lands of the living, unite with allies to complete the task.

item.title: Manor Lords
item.description: Game Description Manor Lords is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. The game mechanics center on the realistic process of constructing buildings and intense fights with the enemy army. The building element is based on historical data about cities and villages. All buildings presented in Manor Lords are as authentic as possible. Landscapes and types of terrain influence the process of settlement formation. Create trade routes, establish market relations with neighboring cities and promote the economic prosperity of the settlement.

item.title: Minicology
item.description: Game Description Minicology drops you into a universe of tiny planets after a crash landing. This interstellar survival sandbox features crafting, combat, and automation. Travel through a procedurally generated universe, visiting a variety of planetary clusters with unique biomes. Build a base, defend against invaders, and even change the planets themselves using terraforming. Minicology encourages creative problem solving, from growing crops to fighting enemies. Gather resources, automate processes, and protect your water source.

item.title: Bellwright
item.description: Game Description Bellwright throws you into a world of rebellion and intrigue. Finding yourself in prison for a heinous crime, you must not only clear your name, but also organize a revolution against a tyrannical ruler. Build and manage settlements, collect resources and recruit villagers into your ranks. Each new adept brings valuable skills, strengthening your rebellion and unlocking new technologies for your cities. Combat is based on skill and focus.

item.title: Next Jianghu 2
item.description: Game Description Next Jianghu 2 offers a single-player adventure in an open martial arts world. The title emphasizes freedom of action through character development in a sandbox format, offering a plot of over 1 million words with dozens of possible endings. Gamers begin their journey by choosing one of a variety of unique backgrounds: scion of a general exploring the world, diligent scholar, wandering fighter, or young lady escaping an arranged marriage, with each line providing a significant, independent story.

item.title: Infection Free Zone
item.description: Game Description Infection Free Zone is a strategic survival game where the player will be responsible for the last remnants of humanity and try to return them to power, at least over the city. All resources are very limited and population expansion is both good and catastrophic, since the consumption of all food increases significantly, which means it is necessary to expand territories and increase production. All the rooms around can be used for your own purposes, restored for comfort, or inventing new uses for them.

item.title: The Planet Crafter
item.description: Game Description The main character ofThe Planet Crafter was sent to a hostile planet to make it suitable for human life. Alone, he will have to extract resources, use existing technologies, found a small settlement and develop technologies. In the future, it will be able to heat the planet and create an atmosphere with a normal amount of oxygen. This will help redirect a large part of the population to the new world.

item.title: From Glory to Goo
item.description: Game Description From Glory to Goo is a cosmic adventure. Forget about the conquest of the new worlds - here the survival depends on how to cling to the fragment of the rock among the inexorable stream of mucus. You play for the captain, the last hope of mankind, who is instructed to establish a fragile colony on a hostile foreign world. Your enemies are not rival empires and not robots with lasers, but the ubiquitous mucus, a reasonable, changing form, the threat that oozes, drips and crawls to your colony from all sides.

item.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege
item.description: Game Description Outpost: Infinity Siege is a fun sci-fi first-person shooter with elements of base building and tower defense. You command the Mobile Outpost and go with the Protoslug Cannon to deeply explore the forbidden zone of Cygnet, where many dangers await you. Collect unique weapon units and strengthen the firepower of the outpost that is fighting with you. This game combines elements of TD, FPS and RTS at the same time, making the gameplay incredibly exciting.

item.title: Rise of Gun
item.description: Game Description Rise of Gun invites gamers to immerse themselves in a post-apocalyptic world where survival depends not only on finding food or fighting zombies, but also on the ability to create weapons from garbage. After a global epidemic turns most of humanity into mindless undead, the protagonist, having lost everything, sets off on a journey to find other survivors. Along the way, he stumbles upon a settlement in which there is hope for the restoration of civilization.

item.title: Scarlet Tower
item.description: Game Description In Scarlet Tower, players have to take control of brave hunters who will hunt down and destroy crowds of evil spirits and other monsters that live in a fantasy world, thus earning their living. You will enjoy the gameplay mechanics, made in the form of an action RPG with roguelike elements. You need to pump up your character and gradually strengthen his combat characteristics and equipment, and also face creatures in battles using a wide range of skills.

item.title: Machick
item.description: Game Description Machick puts a player against the organized force of anti -magic toads aimed at destroying the forest. The main task is to stop this army and regain control of the territory. The gameplay is built on the cycle: Gamer creates personal magic sticks, crushes enemies and gets experience from them. The experience gained is to buy improvements that allow each attempt to move further deep into the conflict. The whole trip is a process of collecting resources to approach the ultimate goal.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description: Game Description In Between the Stars, a space simulator, the gamer discovers new territories, fights with numerous opponents and upgrades his own ship. The hero’s goal is to save the Interstellar Republic. The game has procedural generation of the environment, enemies and stations. The protagonist’s universe is suffering from attacks from the Children of the Sun clan. Enemy representatives have appeared from other worlds and are trying to capture these spaces.

item.title: KeepUp Survival
item.description: Game Description KeepUp Survival is a realistic survival simulator set on a long-abandoned island. The main characters, brother and sister, traveled with the crew on a large ship transporting containers. As a result of a storm, the ship is in distress and the protagonists are thrown ashore, after which they lose consciousness. Then one of them disappears, and the second must be found. But the task is not so simple, because the island is teeming with dangers.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description: Game Description The Outlast Trials - first-person horror game in the Outlast universe. The difference from the main series is that you can play both alone and in a company. At the center of the story is the Murkoff company, which is engaged in inhumane and sadistic experiments. You will play as one of these crazy organizations. You can join forces with up to 4 people and try to survive this nightmare together.

item.title: KeeperRL
item.description: Game Description KeeperRL is a simulator with roguelike elements in which you have to build an underground base and develop a society. You play as a powerful wizard learning black magic. Train minions in military affairs, forcing them to attack civilians in settlements, taking their belongings and burning houses to the ground. Build dungeons, set traps and build up your military power to attack the pitiful people. Be prepared for human heroes to decide to attack back.

item.title: Spiritfall
item.description: Game Description Spiritfall - an action -platformer with elements of a sling, which is based on the gameplay of which is a worked out combat system. It will be necessary to beat enemies, chop everything in their path and throw enemies into the wall. The gameplay is released by speed and concentrated dynamics. Opponents attack every second. At the end of the stage, a fight with a unique boss is waiting.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal ofMyth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Nightingale
item.description: Game Description Nightingale takes you on a dangerous journey through the fantastical kingdoms of the fairies. As a Realmwalker, you’ll explore, craft, build, and fight across a variety of environments, alone or with friends. This open world survival game takes you through a labyrinth of beautiful but treacherous kingdoms. Stranded after the destruction of a network of portals, you must reach Nightingale, the last human bastion. Open portals and travel through wild forests, treacherous swamps and shimmering deserts.

item.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
item.description: Game Description InSmalland: Survive the Wilds the player takes on the role of a hero who has been diminished under unexplained circumstances. The protagonist woke up in the forest, not knowing whether other people had the same fate. With a head full of questions, he begins a struggle whose goal is not only to find out the truth, but, above all, to survive in a new inhospitable world. The player watches what is happening from the first person.

item.title: WitchHand
item.description: Game Description In WitchHand, you take on the role of a powerful witch leading her coven to gain a foothold in the pristine Ninth Kingdom. Use cards to build your empire, strategically manage resources to ensure growth, and choose your path - forge alliances, defeat rivals, or delve into the secrets of the Ninth Realm. Each witch boasts unique spells, buildings, and units to suit different playstyles. The Celestial Sorceress boosts village production, the Chaos Witch crushes enemies with brute force, and the Witch Chef prepares delicious dishes that boost your coven’s stats.

item.title: Legendary Hoplite
item.description: Game Description Legendary Hoplite uses a setting inspired by Greek mythology. The project has its own history, lore and secrets that are revealed as you earn achievements. In the story, Odysseus, who returned from Troy, did not rule Ithaca for long, because he was killed by his own illegitimate son. After this, the city-state was besieged by legions of the dead. Dio volunteered to defend the policy. The young commander can build objects, summon units, use ordinary equipment and use artifacts blessed by the ancient gods themselves.

item.title: Enshrouded
item.description: Game Description Enshrouded is an exciting game set in the kingdom of Embervale, taking players on an exciting journey through a land once devastated by a devastating magical plague. The user will have to explore the remnants of the lost kingdom, fight mutated creatures and unravel the mysterious secrets of the ancient Flame. One of the distinctive features of the project is the emphasis on the independence of the hero.

item.title: The Universim
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city construction, the development of an entire planet and a ward civilization -The Universim is a short sand strategy in which you have to try on the role of God. The game begins with the fact that you settle several people on one of the planets, give them food, indicate what needs to be done - set priorities. And then watch how people develop on their own, without your help.

item.title: Palworld
item.description: Game Description Palworld offers you to find and use friends as helpers in a huge and dangerous world. The multiplayer survival game has elements of crafting, and the creatures themselves, discovered by the user in the process, become his pet friends, which help him at all stages of the passage, including the ability to move on them, construct buildings, engage in farming, production, and explore dungeons. The user finds himself in a virtual universe inhabited by bizarre animal creatures, which in this world are simply called Friends.

item.title: All Quiet in the Trenches
item.description: Game Description In All Quiet in the Trenches, gamers find themselves in the complex environment of the First World War. The title revolves around managing a group of soldiers during a war, balancing the harsh realities of the battlefield with the personal needs of the men under your command. Users take on the role of a German non-commissioned officer, a non-commissioned officer, and control a unit in the trenches. Combining tactical decisions and human interaction, the title unfolds through a series of decisions that affect the fate of soldiers.

item.title: New Cycle
item.description: Game Description New Cycle is a dark city building sim and colony management simulator. This project is made in a post-apocalyptic setting. It takes place in the near future, where people are divided into tribes. In the story, after a powerful solar flare, the planet plunged into chaos. The player is offered to create a new civilization on the ruins of the old one and restore the unity of humanity. The user leads a group of survivors.

item.title: Against the Storm
item.description: Game Description Against the Storm combines two genres. This is a city planning simulator and part-time roguelike. In this game, the gamer becomes a scout and mayor of different cities. The player is transported to a fantasy world where the rain never stops. The settlements are inhabited by people and humanoid intelligent animals: beavers and lizards. In Against the Storm, the user, being the queen’s deputy and pioneer, builds and develops colonies in various biomes, and also satisfies the needs of the population.

item.title: Revive and Prosper
item.description: Game Description Revive and Prosper combines the challenge of building a factory with the tension of surviving in a post-apocalyptic world. Users find themselves at the head of a mission to restore civilization after a catastrophe that changed the world. With limited resources and a barren landscape, the game requires careful planning, strategy, and a fair amount of resilience. As gamers progress, they must build automated factories to manage major production lines, keeping their new world functioning in the face of natural disasters and ever-changing environmental conditions.

item.title: Soulash 2
item.description: Game Description Soulash 2 is an intriguing RPG in which you step into the shoes of an exiled god seeking revenge. The expansive procedurally generated world is a playground replete with simulated history, a dynamic economy, and a huge number of races, factions, and creatures just waiting to be interacted with. The power to conquer and rebuild this world lies in the hands of the player, who wields divine powers and abilities.

item.title: Lost Hope: Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Lost Hope: BackRooms offers a single first -person adventure in the alarming locations of backstage. Key classes include navigation for these confusing, interconnected places and active interaction with the environment for solving logical puzzles, which contributes to the development of the main plot. The area often demonstrates strange and inexplicable phenomena, which are difficult to immediately comprehend. Gamers have to carefully study these elements in order to reveal the secrets hidden in this tense journey.

item.title: Of Blades and Tails
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric adventures in Of Blades and Tails take gamers into a fantasy world where the main character is a sly fox. The game is made in the genre of role-playing adventure, which is drawn in old-school pixel graphics. A cunning and savvy fox named Riff sets off on a long journey due to the events that have occurred that affected his native clan and other inhabitants of the kingdom living in the territory of a large state.

item.title: Polylithic
item.description: Game Description Polylithic takes players into the heart of the Paleolithic/Neolithic era, where survival depends on cunning, resourcefulness and ingenuity. As the newly minted leader of your tribe, you’ll face the daunting task of leading your people through a vibrant, low-poly wilderness teeming with both opportunity and danger. You will spend the first days in a frantic struggle for survival. Hunger gnaws at your belly, the elements threaten your fragile existence, and every rustle in the underbrush can attract a predator.

item.title: Living Cell
item.description: Game Description Living Cell is a dark adventure game with survival elements that immerses you in the atmosphere of Samosbor - a dystopian world where residents live in endless apartment buildings called “Gigahrushchevkas”. In this exciting story, you will take the place of the liquidator, who is entrusted with the responsibility of maintaining order and security in the quarter. At the beginning of the story, players find themselves the only survivors in block G-326 after a mysterious incident.

item.title: Out of Orbit
item.description: Game Description Out of Orbit offers space experience, focused on the liberty of the player in accidentally created universes. Gamers design, build and command their own starships, or can attack, disassemble or capture the vessels of others. People base planetary bases to expand the influence and extraction of materials. The actions of the gamer affect the game world and have long -term consequences. Any ship met can be taken on boarding and destroyed.

item.title: Alaskan Road Truckers
item.description: Game Description ALASKAN ROAD TRUCKERS - A car simulator in which you will become a driver of huge trucks, being a trucker in snowy Alaska. Call a challenge of one of the most severe and dangerous environments that could only be in such simulators. Test your strength and try to survive in a harsh environment. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to see the stunning beauty of this northern region.

item.title: The Front
item.description: Game Description In The Front, your task, as a resistance fighter, boils down to go into the past in order to prevent the formation of a tyrannical empire that threatens the very existence of mankind. The game is a craft shooter with an open world, immersing a player in a post -apocalyptic sandbox, teeming with mutants and hostile groups. In this terrain destroyed by the war, you have to fight with tyrannical imperial forces, exiles, bandits and rebels in an epic battle, which will determine the future of mankind.

item.title: Dotage
item.description: Game Description Dotage offers a unique game experience. Michele was feasted and others developed the concept of this digital kingdom. Players move around the world devoid of clear goals. The gameplay rotates around simple mechanics: pressing one button moves the protagonist forward. This seemingly simple action becomes the basis for a trip, rich in interpretation. The visual language of the game consists of abstract landscapes and mysterious symbols. The narrative unfolds through these elements, inviting to introspection, and not giving obvious explanations.

item.title: Saleblazers
item.description: Game Description Saleblazers offers to enjoy the exciting experience of survival in the multiplayer action, in which you have to create a store and survive in a dangerous world filled with various dangers. On this dangerous island you will have to build cozy cafes or huge shopping centers in the company with other players. The whole world of the game is a reactive sandbox, where each buyer has his own character, tastes and preferences.

item.title: El Paso, Elsewhere
item.description: Game Description El Paso, Elsewhere immerses players in dynamic shootings with werewolves, vampires and other evil spirits that make his way to the surface of the planet. Events transfer to the territory of a small Texas settlement under the name El Passes, where he will have to fight terrible opponents. The main character finds himself in a small three -story hotel hiding the secret deep underground. Players will have to go down to dark basements to go through 46 combat missions and destroy hellish creatures.

item.title: Black Forest
item.description: Game Description Plunging players into a world of danger, death and despair, Black Forest offers a unique twist on the city-building genre. As the headman of an ill-fated village, your only goal is to survive. The journey begins with gathering resources and fortifying the village to prepare for the terrible night ahead. Will you emerge victorious, enduring all horrors until salvation comes, or will you give in in the face of insurmountable challenges?

item.title: Galaxy Pass Station
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Pass Station, a comical space station colony simulation, takes players on a whimsical journey into the bustling world of intergalactic hospitality. We will take on the role of the first stationmaster, who will provide excellent service and build the most wonderful center in the galaxy for a variety of alien guests. Here are 13 alien races, each of which has its own quirks and characteristics: the mysterious Tintukians, funny Zubenoids, curious Martians, mischievous Slu, incomprehensible Grays and many others.

item.title: The Matchless KungFu
item.description: Game Description The Matchless KungFu immerses users in a world where martial arts are at the forefront. The gamer can choose the path of any warrior he likes and go on a journey through these lands. Be a loner or join a group of like-minded people - you can choose any convenient way. Only the decisions made will shape the character’s story, throwing him into different circumstances, giving him complete freedom of action in certain aspects.

item.title: Sunkenland
item.description: Game Description Sunkenland is a fun adventure game that offers a unique take on the survival genre. The game immerses us in the world of the water element, which is both beautiful and dangerous. It involves mining resources, crafting items, building bases, trading and fighting pirates to survive in an aquatic environment plagued by hunger and violence. The game features a variety of locations such as sunken cities, atolls, floating bases and abandoned structures.

item.title: Desynced
item.description: Game Description Desynced is a three -dimensional real -time strategy. The indie project also has elements of survival and a colony control simulator. The Title is made in a science fiction setting. It has support for user modifications. According to the plot, the hero travels along with artificial intelligence and colonizers between distant planets. The protagonist plants bots to the surface, and he remains in orbit and leads mechanical creatures from there.

item.title: Sengoku Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Sengoku Dynasty tells the story of difficult life in feudal Japan. To convey everything with maximum accuracy, the developers consulted with a historical group, which provided valuable advice and confirmed records with information about the life of that period. The player will have to become the leader of one of the villages and lead it to prosperity and expansion in one of the ways. The player will have one, almost abandoned settlement at his disposal, which he will have to restore and provide the inhabitants with everything they need.

item.title: Super Raft Boat Together
item.description: Game Description Super Raft Boat Together is an adventure for those who love danger and teamwork! In a world inundated by a mysterious flood, you and your trusty boat are all that’s left. But don’t be afraid! Along with three friends, you’ll battle ruthless sea creatures as you build and expand your raft to reach the final island, where the truth about the flood will finally be revealed. This multiplayer roguelike shooter offers endless excitement as you navigate a variety of breathtaking biomes, strategically choosing trinkets to create the ultimate, super-powered structure.

item.title: My Friendly Neighborhood
item.description: Game Description My Friendly Neighborhood immerses users for the role of a simple repairman Gordon, which is forced to cope with gloomy and revived puppets attacking the hero during the play “Our friendly neighborhood.” The protagonist is forced to survive and cope with various puzzles to find a way out of the trap. The MFN game is an action horror where you have to cope with dynamic levels, using a variety of weapons for self -defense.

item.title: Yet Another Zombie Survivors
item.description: Game Description Yet Another Zombie Survivors is an action roginal for those who are ready to fight with the horde of undead! Humanity can be on the verge of extinction, but this does not mean that you will fall without a fight. This is not a typical game with long scenes and complex management - here you need to immediately join the battle and see how sparks fly! Regardless of what your level of game experience you have, you will enjoy this game.

item.title: Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners 1
item.description: Game Description Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners #1 occurs in the Nazi concentration camp, where the main characters are prisoners who are going to execute for participation in the conspiracy of the rebels. However, they soon find out that death is not the worst thing that can happen to them, because they will find an even more terrible fate. They must find a way to escape from the nightmare that awaits them in the camp.

item.title: Life Not Supported
item.description: Game Description Life Not Supported is a survival simulator for the brave and courageous! You are the only survivor, stuck in vast empty space orbiting a mysterious planet that could become your new home. However, things don’t go as planned, and you’re tied to what’s left of your ship. With limited resources and time running out, you must scavenge nearby debris and assemble a makeshift vessel to escape the dangers of space and uncover the truth behind the ship’s malfunction.

item.title: Brotato
item.description: Game Description In the shooterBratato you have to take control of a potato using a variety of guns while fighting alien creatures. The gameplay includes roguelite genre elements. Locations are procedurally generated, and each run can take up to 30 minutes of real time. There are dozens of types of weapons and additional items of equipment to choose from, allowing you to progress at your own pace and combine the effects of items.

item.title: Army of ruin
item.description: Game Description Army of Ruin is a hybrid of a shooter, a horned, action and an auto -waist. It has a meta-progression. For the collected coins, you can forever pump the stats in the breaks between the races. According to the plot, legendary heroes fight the Evil Army. Before starting the game, you can choose a character and a card. Some fighters and locations are originally blocked. They become accessible in the fulfillment of certain conditions.

item.title: Occupy Mars: The Game
item.description: Game Description Colonizing a planet in Occupy Mars is a challenging but fun task. Here the player will have to build his own base, explore the expanses of the red desert, extract water, grow food and find new ways to obtain oxygen. An open world with great sandbox potential will allow you to seriously immerse yourself in the role of a pioneer on Mars. Using advanced technologies, Occupy Mars will create a developed network of buildings.

item.title: Voidtrain
item.description: Game Description In the fairy-tale world of Voidtrain, you need to survive by train. Here the player awaits a journey between unique worlds filled with dangers and adventures. The main characters were mechanics who were sorting out the rubble of a war-torn laboratory in Koenigsberg. Here they find secret Nazi documents pointing to strange research. They lead the mechanics to a portal to the Interworld - a parallel reality filled with wonders.

item.title: Keeper's Toll
item.description: Game Description Keeper’s Toll is a fun and challenging game that will test the skills of any gamer who enjoys the classic retro time survival genre. Featuring unique dark fantasy elements, the game boasts a carefully crafted blend of skill-based gameplay, roguelike elements, and unique mechanics that set it apart from others in the genre. Gamers will be able to choose from six different heroes, each with their own defining mechanics, abilities, and meta progression.

item.title: Stranded: Alien Dawn
item.description: Game Description Stranded: Alien Dawn is an open world survival simulator. In this case, an alien. According to the plot, a group of people on a rescue shuttle is evacuated from a burning starship and landed on the first planet that fall. The player controls the team of surviving crew members of the space ship. He needs to take care of his wards, providing them with warmth, light, food, medicines, weapons, entertainment.

item.title: Shardpunk
item.description: Game Description Shardpunk is an isometric game whose gameplay is a mixture of XCOM and Darkest Dungeon. The setting is made in steampunk style. In the Capitol of the Empire, where the action takes place, a plague epidemic began and the streets were filled with rats. You take control of a survivor trying to escape the city. On your way you will meet survivors whom you can save. It is necessary not only to go through the entire Capitol, but also to defeat a huge number of mutated creatures, explore locations, collect useful resources and try to survive in this nightmare.

item.title: Wartales
item.description: Game Description Wartales is an open-world role-playing adventure that lets you lead your team of mercenaries on a treasure hunt. Events take place in a medieval fantasy world. You need to travel across continents, recruit party members, explore ancient tombs and collect rewards. The plot begins with the fall of the great Edoran Empire. The kingdom is engulfed in a plague, killing every living thing in its path. In connection with this, banditry, theft, murder and looting increased.

item.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 4 Remake is a full-fledged remake of the cult fourth part, which is rightfully considered one of the best in the series. The developers took into account the criticism of fans after the release of the remake of the third game and did not stray far from their roots, adhering to the course taken with Resident Evil 2. The plot has not undergone drastic changes, however, some storylines have been added that were not in the original, the arcs of minor characters have expanded and, Of course, the controls have been improved and the graphics have been significantly updated.

item.title: Barotrauma
item.description: Game Description Barotrauma is a two -dimensional simulator decorated in the style of the platformer. According to the plot, your courageous shoulders are entrusted to enter the captain of the real submarine, but you will not control it on the ground, but on one of the satellites of Jupiter called Europe, in the bowels of which the underground ocean spreads. The surface of the satellite is shrouded in an impassable radiation layer, due to which the colony of people are forced to hide under the thickness of the ice that protect the local waters.

item.title: Terraformers
item.description: Game Description Terraformers - 3x game with Roguelite elements, in which you are heading the terraforming of Mars. Get on the Red Planet, where there are no buildings of humanity. Use the resources of the environment and gradually expand your base, based on new cities, settlements and industrial territories. Start the process of terraforming by warming the planet, editing oceans and spreading life thanks to bacteria and brought creatures. Control the leaders and send them to mysterious places to open huge places rich in resources.

item.title: Contraband Police
item.description: Game Description Contraband Police - The simulator of the border guard in the first person. The player in the role of the commander of the border post makes an inspection of transport for the presence of smuggling on the border of the third world countries. The inspection tasks include: checking documents: inspection and permit for entry criminals … or take a bribe. What? Nobody heard this! To carry out reports on the successful completion of tasks through the mail; the accumulated experience can be spent on pumping the department, buying new equipment or training dogs;

item.title: The Pale Beyond
item.description: Game Description The Pale Beyond is a survival visual novel where every choice has a solution. The Arctic is harsh and cruel to anyone who decides to enter its territory, and explorers must always be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. But even they can be broken by some kind of misfortune and being on the verge of death from lack of food and terrible cold. Several years ago, the ship Viscount set out in search of the absolute South, but failed and never returned.

item.title: Plains of Pain
item.description: Game Description Plains of Pain is a dark, post-apocalyptic multiplayer action game that takes you into a world of survival where hope has faded and all that remains is the ultimate end of days. This is no ordinary game - it’s a journey into a sun-scorched dystopian world that will push you to the brink of your sanity. The backstory is chillingly real. When the planet was engulfed by monstrous solar flares, Earth’s wealthiest people fled Earth as part of a secret government initiative, leaving the remaining population to fend for itself.

item.title: Fargone
item.description: Game Description Fargone is a role shooter with survival elements in which gamers fall into the world after a mysterious nuclear disaster, known as the Wasteland. Here you will have to survive by any means, whether it is alone or entering into alliances with various fractions. Explore the gloomy and atmospheric lands of the wasteland, where life continues, despite the terrible catastrophe. Here you will find not only other surviving, but also stray corpses affected by infection caused by disaster.

item.title: Dwarf Fortress
item.description: Game Description Dwarf Fortress is a strategy game with a complex open world simulation. You control a race of dwarves whose goal is to build their own fortress. To collect resources, you need to go explore the huge open world. Territories are generated randomly and contain many dangers. Don’t let your civilization fall into decay! Mechanics are represented by combat skills, physical properties of materials, pain, nausea, various poisoning effects, etc.

item.title: In Nightmare
item.description: Game Description In Nightmare allows gamers to plunge into a dark atmosphere where they have to take control of a boy who has lost his beloved. The protagonist will make his way through dangerous locations where monsters live. The project is a horror adventure game with elements of an action platformer, where you need to overcome various obstacles on the hero’s path, solve puzzles, deal with monsters and look for the right path out of the frightening kingdom of darkness.

item.title: Floodland
item.description: Game Description Floodland is a city builder with survival, strategy and roguelike elements. With each new playthrough, the map is generated randomly. Events are also generated randomly. This increases replayability. The project uses a post-apocalyptic setting. The user can choose one of the clans. Each faction has its own unique perks. You can be friends or fight with other factions. The player is asked to build buildings, improve buildings, extract resources, find food, look for lost technologies, explore islands, take care of his charges and train them into specialists, help other survivors or deal with competitors.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip
item.description: Game Description Monster Prom 3: Monster Roadtrip - a continuation of the popular series of satirical adventure, the actions of which unfold in a fabulous universe. Instead of people, it is inhabited by various very cute monsters of all possible species and appearance. Unlike previous parts, here the developers do not focus on the simulation of dates, but on road travel and survival. Juzer needs to get to a certain epic place in order to end the campaign successfully.

item.title: Stardeus
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator Stardeus will plunge you into a cosmic world where there are no familiar objects, and, of course, there are robotic systems, spaceships, and advanced artificial intelligence that helps with everything. The main character, in the role of AI, is called upon to restore order on a large space cruiser, simultaneously building his own colony and introducing automation into the spheres of life of the newly built city.

item.title: Salt 2: Shores of Gold
item.description: Game Description Salt 2: Shores of Gold tells the story of the complex life of a lone pirate who travels on a small sailing ship. Unlike other games on a similar theme, this project does not focus on sea battles or robbing other ships. The player will have to spend the bulk of his time constantly exploring the vast expanses of water and searching for treasures. The main character feels that the ocean is his real home.

item.title: Card Survival: Tropical Island
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Tropical Island – takes you into the atmosphere of tropical islands, on which the protagonist will have to survive and settle down. Players gain experience managing the time and resources available to build the structures and tools needed to live a solitary life in the wild. Being in an area filled with various materials and natural objects of the environment, you will have to search and collect useful elements that allow you to live in an area unfavorable for humans.

item.title: CHEMISTS: Area of ​​infection
item.description: Game Description CHEMISTS: Area of ​​Infection is a 3rd person shooter that will take you to an alternate reality full of dangers and mysteries. Years have passed since a global catastrophe, and you wake up in a hospital, remembering nothing from the past. Now your task is to survive in this harsh world and find out what happened. Players will have to rely on their experience and navigate the environment, remembering every corner so as not to get lost.

item.title: After the Collapse
item.description: Game Description AFTER The COLLAPSE is a 2D strategy, a management and management simulator of its own settlement. A camera that is above above the surface at right angles is used. The surrounding world survived the apocalypse, which is why it turned into radioactive wastelands and became very dangerous for living people without means of protection against monsters and aggressive bandits. The task of the gamer is to develop existing buildings and build new ones to increase population growth and create a powerful army that is ready to fight off external threats.

item.title: Farthest Frontier
item.description: Game Description Farthest Frontier is a strategic game with the simulator elements. The game is made by all canons of 4x-mechanics. You have to develop your settlement and defend it from an attack by the enemy. Guide your people and try not only to survive, but also to develop. The world of wildlife is fraught with many dangers with which you have to face face every day. Collect resources, go hunting, do fishing or farming - do everything possible to survive in harsh and wild conditions.

item.title: Civitatem
item.description: Game Description Civitatem is a single-player city-planning simulator with a top-down view and a medieval setting, expressed in the architecture of the buildings available for construction, the clothing of the population and the technologies present. The gamer helps civilians find a place to live to replace the old one, which was destroyed during an attack by bandits. By correctly distributing human resources to all areas of activity under the player’s control, one can achieve immediate growth of the settlement and the discovery of technologies that make life much easier.

item.title: Surroundead
item.description: Game Description Surroundead is a survival simulator in the open world where the apocalypse happened. In the indie project, you can switch between the view from the first and third-party. Its three -dimensional graphics are made in Low Poly style. According to the plot, a zombie virus appeared on Earth. For 5 years, people fought to him unsuccessfully. As a result, the planet has changed forever. Along the devastated streets, living dead began to roam, and civilization in its level of development rolled back to dark times.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Postal: Brain Damage
item.description: Game Description Postal: Brain Damageed - Spin -Off series of a series of old -time jumper in the first person. Here, a classic dynamic gameplay for the same name is implemented, as well as the mass of black humor, satire, rudeness and recklessness. The game proposes the most crazy arsenal of weapons, there are many bonuses and a twisted plot, which is based on violence. To this end, the ability to strike the head, carry out a real massacre and even damage the brain to the opponent.

item.title: Keplerth
item.description: Game Description The events of the futuristic Indo-video trigger Keplerth unfold in the distant future-on the previously unknown planet Kepler. According to the genre, the project can be attributed to the simulator of survival with the possibility of construction and RPG elements. According to the plot, people built a large spaceship, which was supposed to transport the colonists on board to the nearest planet suitable for life. But there is a disaster, as a result of which the ship crashes on an unknown planet.

item.title: Outward
item.description: Game Description The third-person RPG Outward features some challenging survival aspects. Your traveler will go into the open world, where he will have to monitor his own temperature, the availability of water, food and energy. Without the proper level of these factors, the character will die faster. For example, you may get a cold if you don’t find a cure in time, and bad food will give you an upset stomach, so choose what you eat carefully.

item.title: Kapital: Sparks of Revolution
item.description: Game Description Kapital: Sparks of Revolution is a city planning simulator that allows you to deal with all economic issues in managing the capital. Events start at a time when European countries find themselves in a deep systemic crisis. There is a class struggle and it becomes difficult to avoid a social explosion. The player finds himself in such conditions. What price must be paid to save Europe from anarchy?

item.title: Stacklands
item.description: Game Description InStacklands you have to build a village, completing various levels in the style of a deck-building battler. Users will collect food, build buildings and fight monsters on a special field using ability cards. It will be possible to use combinations of cards. For example, when you move a “village dweller” to a “berry bush”, “berries” will appear, which the city dweller will consume as food and get a chance to survive.

item.title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
item.description: Game Description Dying Light 2: Stay Human starts 15 years after humanity became infected with a terrible virus. Many have turned into zombies who scour in search of living flesh, and the few survivors wage a daily struggle for existence. People are divided into several warring factions, which during the day make forays from shelters to find resources, and at night they hide from bloodthirsty monsters. The world has returned to its primitive state, where everyone fights only for their own lives.

item.title: DeadPoly
item.description: Game Description The DeadPoly universe has undergone colossal changes that have turned the lives of humanity upside down. A disaster occurred due to problems in the laboratory, where scientists did not keep track of the spread of the terrible virus. The planet gradually began to become infected, and people mutated into the walking dead, aggressively opposed to any other forms of life. The user takes control of a character who is destined to find himself in a brutal post-apocalyptic environment, where many factors besides creatures pose danger.

item.title: Savage Lands
item.description: Game Description Savage Lands is a fantasy survival game on PC in a medieval setting. Before starting the game, you are invited to customize your character a little: hair, skin color, face, tattoos. Next, you appear on the shore of the island. The wreckage of a boat is visible in the water. The only thought in my head is: “What am I doing here?” The interface is very simple: in the right corner of the screen there is a guide or tasks that you can complete.

item.title: Noble Fates
item.description: Game Description The fantasy world of Noble Fates immerses you in adventures taking place in a fairy-tale kingdom. A group of gods oversee the plane of human material existence while mortals vie for control over territories and new lands. The main character is Contra, who is a demigod and capable of influencing people and other inhabitants of the planet. It will be possible to manage entire colonies of settlers in order to achieve prosperity for the future great civilization.

item.title: Breakwaters
item.description: Game Description In Breakwaters, the player will reconnolate the procedurally generated world with monstrous ocean depths and huge titans that change the method of interaction with water. Water is replaced by powerful crystals obtained in the mine. The user is able to delve into its bowels to collect rare objects, build obstacles to restrain the ocean or block waves, and help people after destruction. Titans, creatures of an extinct submarine race, wander around the world, causing cataclysms.

item.title: Icarus
item.description: Game Description Icarus is a first -person survival that will send you to explore the secrets of one distant planet. You wake up from cryosn after your shuttle made a forced landing on the surface of a mysterious planet. Now you need to stay alive, surviving in unusual conditions. Collect resources, craft items and play both alone and along with other players. The gameplay Ikarus can be described as cooperative action with survival elements.

item.title: Thrive
item.description: Game Description Thrive users will try themselves as an observer, which will track the natural evolution of cells living on an alien planet. The game is a simulator where you have to survive in a dangerous environment with competing species that are fighting for resources. Players will take control of an organism that emerged from the last universal ancestor called LUCA. The main goal for the hero is survival and adaptation to new mutations.

item.title: Dysmantle
