item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Urge
item.description: Game Description Urge is an exciting and addictive game that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic environment where users take on the role of a car accident survivor. The plot revolves around a mysterious drug called fog that has corrupted the world. This substance reacts to actions, shaping the environment and influencing the behavior of enemies encountered. The game mechanics offer a fun experience while allowing you to make strategic choices. Making short work of enemies by shooting them in the head may seem like a viable option, but it comes with consequences.

item.title: Evil Tonight
item.description: Game Description Evil Tonight is an action-adventure game with role-playing game elements. Take control of a brave heroine who is not afraid to look Evil in the eye. As an experienced exorcist, the girl Sylvia encounters numerous horrors of ancient estates and crypts. She has the unusual ability to materialize evil and fight it in open battle. The visual side is represented by pixel style. Face ghosts and other evil spirits as you unravel the mystery of a huge mansion.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: Medieval Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Medieval Dynasty is an adventure in medieval Europe, where nobles and clergy rule. The country conducts active trade with its neighbors and is prospering. You will become a poor man who lives by hunting and farming. Go from a loner to the head of a community. Set up a small camp and turn it into your own settlement. Find food by chasing wild animals, including deer, wild boar and rabbits.

item.title: Scrapnaut
item.description: Game Description Scrapnaut stands out against the background of other sandboxes with elements of survival with its concept. The hero has to fight for life in an open world using the surroundings of steampunk. He periodically fights steam robots and is engaged in the study of the surroundings. On the back, the protagonist wears an oxygen cylinder, so it is important to monitor the level of air. The appearance of the adventurer can be changed due to the change of clothing.

item.title: TimberBorn
item.description: Game Description TimberBorn allows you to develop a beaver colony. The game does not claim realism, because rodents behave and move like people. This is a full -fledged urban planning simulator. The settlement has to rebuild in the world where humanity has disappeared, leaving behind the exhausted land. In an alternative future, the planet suffers from drought. To control the water resource in TimberBorn, you can build dams and dig channels.

item.title: Residual
item.description: Game Description Residual is a platformer with elements of the survival simulator. The game can boast of the worked out pixel graphics and procedural generation of the world. It is made in a science fiction setting. According to the plot, the hero crashes on one of the planets in the forgotten part of the galaxy. Its task is to study alien technologies and find a way to fix a starship.

item.title: HUMANKIND
item.description: Game Description In the 4X strategy HUMANKIND, the player will have to lead his own civilization through all eras of human development. You have to develop cities, create an army and manage units, participating in battles on land and sea. The fictional planet is procedurally generated and includes multiple regions. At the start of the passage, they are not occupied by anyone, but gradually new rulers appear and territories are captured by other factions.

item.title: The Doors of Trithius
item.description: Game Description The Doors of Trithius is a RPG -Rogalik in the fantasy world with procedurally generated content. Here you have to fight monsters, avoid traps, collect prey and much more, traveling along the mysterious world of Enalia. Every time you start the game, you have to explore the new generated city, dungeon and map of the world. Movement and battle use a unique time system, returning the priority of the player based on the speed of weapons or action, maintaining tactical decisions, as well as knowledge about your enemies.

item.title: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone
item.description: Game Description Clone Drone in the Danger Zone is an exciting arcade game in which the player will play as a person whose mind has been transferred into an iron robot! The player enters the arena with the only task - to survive. It is worth considering that each opponent is endowed with individual characteristics and skills, so winning will not be easy. Each blow is under the close attention of a robot commentator, who will cover the course of the battle and your actions throughout it.

item.title: Tunguska: The Visim
item.description: Game Description After the fall of the meteorite, in Tunguska: The Visitation begins the invasion of mutants. Having fallen to the ground in the Tunguska area, the alien body caused the transformation of all local residents. As a result, a special zone is formed here, the main goal in which is to survive and survive against enemies. The game often has to make a difficult choice, on the result of which its own existence depends.

item.title: Going Medieval
item.description: Game Description Going Medieval is a simulator in which you need to build a fortress on the ruins of an old castle and equip it to protect your settlement. Any event can affect the mood of your people, so you need to satisfy all their needs and be a good king. Events unfold in the era of the dark Middle Ages of the late XIV century. Only five percent of the population survived after a heavy plague epidemic.

item.title: Days Gone
item.description: Game Description Days gone tells the story of Deikon Saint-Jones. The former member of the Mad Dog Motokoksluba suffers from the loss of the spouse and wanders through an almost destroyed epidemic to the open world. He is inhabited by the remaining groups of peaceful people, looters, crazy cultists, wild animals and freezers. The latter are like zombies. However, these are not revived dead, but live creatures. And these monsters move much faster than any undead.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world ofSubnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Resident Evil Village
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Village continues the adventures of Ethan from the Seven. The Roman numeral hidden in the title on the posters hints that this is not a spin-off, but the eighth part of the series. This is already the tenth project in the main line. Winters was able to escape from the cannibal mansion and save his wife Mia. They got away from the American outback and decided to live an ordinary life.

item.title: First Feudal
item.description: Game Description First Feudal takes the gamer to the classic Middle Ages and invites you to become a feudal lord (landowner and lord). The game does not have a plot - users face a classic sandbox with endless gameplay. Initially it will be difficult, because a small village is vulnerable and a small landowner is not able to protect it. But try to make good money and gather your own army so that no one tries to take the resources.

item.title: Mr. Prepper
item.description: Game Description Mr. Prepper is a construction simulator where you have to build a bunker under a residential building. Mr. The survivor of those who believe in the theory of conspiracies and understands that a serious threat of nuclear war hung over the world. He does not care about his neighbors and those who do not believe him, so he alone begins to build his own bomb shelter. The nuclear war is close and you must be ready!

item.title: Endzone - A World Apart
item.description: Game Description Endzone - A World Apart is a post-apocalyptic mayor simulator, where under your strict guidance there will be a small settlement in need of a competent leader capable of developing a small commune that has survived a nuclear war. The plot tells how in 2021 one terrorist group carried out a nuclear bombing of all known states, as a result of which the planet systematically plunged into global chaos.

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is a survival in the open world where you will build your own base and fight with the mythical creatures of Scandinavian folklore. The events of the game take place in Valheim - the tenth world of the Vikings. The goal of the hero is to get to the gate of Walgalla. Killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit the most diverse corners of the world: thick forests, snowy mountains and much more.

item.title: DEVOUR
item.description: Game Description DEVOUR is a first-person cooperative survival game that allows up to four players to team up. In this atmospheric and scary horror, your task is to stop a dark cult that is turning people into bloodthirsty and possessed creatures. Find the leader and destroy him before he drags you to hell. Run, hide and try to resist. Never let yourself be pinned into a corner! The leader of a mystical order called the Guardians of Azazel is a certain Anna Puerta.

item.title: Founders' Fortune
item.description: Game Description Founders' Fortune is a fantasy sim where, in addition to building and defending a base, you need to monitor the psychological state of the heroes. The colonists reach the island empty-handed to settle in a new place. By collecting resources, they build houses and various objects. Construction begins with walls and floors, after which furniture is placed and the façade is put in order. Colonists are the main element of Founders' Fortune.

item.title: Kingdoms Reborn
item.description: Game Description Kingdoms Reborn is a urban planning simulator with a full multipleor and card game elements. The project was primarily created under the online, but there is also a single in it. The world is randomly generated. It is divided into 7 biomes that do not gameplay. In the Arctic zone and tropics, it will be more difficult to grow food on ordinary fields than in the territory with a temperate climate.

item.title: Mesmer
item.description: Game Description Mesmer is a revolution simulator that is a vibrant adventure in which you need to unite people and take a fortress by storm. Take on the role of the leader of a revolutionary uprising, influencing the consciousness of people and factions operating within the city. The secret police are monitoring every action, so be vigilant! The task is simple: to lead Mesmer and his people to a better life.

item.title: Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game
item.description: Game Description Under the Sand REDUX - a road trip game is an adventure game in which the player is invited to travel around the world by car. The universe around the main character experienced a terrible apocalypse, turning into a desert. Graphically, the project is made using low-detail textures to create its own style. The locations where the gamer is present are created randomly thanks to the use of artificial intelligence in the process of generating territories, which is responsible for randomizing the environment.

item.title: Endless Furry Killer 2020
item.description: Game Description The conflict in Endless Furry Killer 2020 puts a player against the endless waves of anthropomorphic opponents. The gamer has to move through two -dimensional arenas with a view of the top intended for continuous battles. The key lesson lies in the shooting of goals in a tense struggle for life with a constant stream of enemies. Such a gameplay requires constant movement and aiming to defeat non -aloscorizing resistance.

item.title: Songs of Syx
item.description: Game Description Songs of Syx is a top-down city builder with roguelike elements. The progression system allows you to turn a small colony into a full-fledged settlement, from a village into a large city, and from a metropolis into an entire empire. When creating a state, to maintain the capital, you will need to build other settlements, castles, and ports. The maximum number of inhabitants in the village is 30,000 people.

item.title: Ostranauts
item.description: Game Description Ostranauts-a role-playing lifetime in a zero gravity in a noir ship, which is located in outer space. The game supports only a single -user study of the universe, and has no voice acting, the information is submitted in the form of text in subtitles or notes. The main character is a character that is created and customized personally by a gamer in order to achieve uniqueness. Also, before the start of the passage, the initial ship is also set up, which is subject to further improvement after collecting the necessary resources.

item.title: Factorio
item.description: Game Description The new planet should have everything to provide people with a comfortable, peaceful existence. Factorio is a sandbox in 2D graphics, where a new planet should be fully equipped for the future life of people. As soon as we arrive in a new place, we need to extract resources, assemble elements from them, and build structures so that people in the future can settle in and exist peacefully. Don’t forget that the planet reacts aggressively to colonizers.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: Empyrion - Galactic Survival
item.description: Game Description Empyrion - Galactic Survival shows the world of the future. In the 24th century, in the ice of Antarctica, they find a spacecraft of aliens. Scientists investigated the object and discovered the technology of the hyperdrod. Earthlings send an expedition to the planet Empirion, which is in the Andromeda nebula. The crew gets to the destination, but tolerates the crash and cannot return home. In survival mode, the player leaves the rescue capsule and is alone against the hostile world.

item.title: Crosshair X
item.description: Game Description The Crosshair X software application for gamers will allow you to freely customize your sight in any way for games focused on shooter gameplay mechanics, and gives the final answer to the question: “how to make a sight for Rasta or CS GO?” Players can choose one of the presented presets to apply it or create their own based on it. The project has the ability to make the desired skin and size for the cursor from scratch, using a flexible editor with a settings window.

item.title: Cepheus Protocol
item.description: Game Description Cepheus Protocol is a real-time strategy game where you are given a large open world so that you have the opportunity to find patient zero. A terrible virus has taken over San Francisco, turning residents into bloodthirsty monsters. You will lead a squad of soldiers from the Center for Epidemic Research and Control (CERC) fighting on the streets of an infected city. The task is to find the zero infected person to defeat the epidemic.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic is a co-op shooter with fast-paced gameplay in which you will fight with other users against alien monsters. The game is made in a sci-fi style and has procedurally generated levels in which you will fight. The mission can be completed by 1 to 4 players. Act as one. Dig, explore the area and shoot with enemies waiting for you in huge numbers around every corner.

item.title: Fallout 76
item.description: Game Description According to the plot ofFallout 76, the first people came out of shelters after a nuclear war. They set off to explore the Wasteland, where mutants are already lying in wait. The player will be able to visit 6 regions, each of which has its own types of dangerous animals and landscape. Among the scorched desert there are also wooded areas with red trees. What is most surprising is that quite recently the desert territories were inhabited by those who were able to survive the apocalypse on the surface.

item.title: Zompiercer
item.description: Game Description Conceptively Zompiercer is a sandbox with an open detailed world, but the whole thing is played as a first-person shooter about survival during the zombie apocalypse. The planet is covered by a virus. People mutated in bloodthirsty walking corpses. Not many managed to survive, but you are lucky more than the rest. Or not? Survival is just beginning! The game from an independent developer under the nickname DDDIMANN is not a comprehension not by the setting, but by the scale and the implementation of ideas.

item.title: Ostriv
item.description: Game Description OSTRIV, this is a city -building simulator that makes you the ruler of the monarch of the 18th century. The player will have to work hard and show his ability to the manager, as well as creative abilities. The goal of the game to transfer the gameplay of simulators of this kind to a new level, by means of adding a huge number of opportunities and abandoning the usual restrictions.

item.title: Stoneshard
item.description: Game Description Come in the role of a harsh mercenary in a harsh, ruined war, kingdom. Take part in step -by -step battles and examine the RPG elements of Stoneshard, available in the gameplay. You can perform contracts, secondary and plot missions. Heal the wounds, purchase equipment and improve the protagonist as soon as you wish. Freely move around the big and seamless world. Explore the villages lying in the ruins, go down to the dungeons or look into abandoned tracts.

item.title: Necesse
item.description: Game Description Necesse is an adventure sandbox with a procedurally generated world. Controlling the main character, you need to build a settlement and upgrade your character. There are many spacious locations available for exploration where you can extract various minerals. You can craft items from collected materials. Traveling around the world, the protagonist meets different characters. You can take quests from them or trade with NPCs. In the dungeons you can find powerful weapons.

item.title: The Sapling
item.description: Game Description The Sapling is a simulator in which you will be selected by growing new plant species or crossing animals. Build your own world inhabited by unusual animals and a phantasmagoric fauna. The Sapling allows you to choose a random mutation mode to be a third -party observer, providing nature to conduct evolution itself and create its own ecosystems. At any time, you can take the development of the environment into your own hands.

item.title: Flotsam
item.description: Game Description A construction simulator with survival elements, Flotsam allows you to become the owner of a floating city. Imagine that the land has simply disappeared and you can only survive on a raft, and at the same time you also need to extract resources. According to the plot, at a certain point, humanity damaged nature so much that a global catastrophe eventually occurred, which led to the flooding of all continents.

item.title: Green Hell
item.description: Game Description Green Hell is a survival simulator that fans of real hero exhaustion in the wild jungle have been waiting for a long time! The main character will visit the dark forests of the Amazon with only a walkie-talkie from objects of “his time”, and he will be helped by his hands and head, which over time will begin to betray. Survival, exhaustion, mentally damaged health of the main character.

item.title: Shortest Trip to Earth
item.description: Game Description Shortest Trip to Earth, a futuristic spaceship control simulator, sends the character to the distant future, where he must conquer the Universe. The project is not tied to the plot and the gameplay is presented through the passage of a large number of procedurally generated levels. The developers did not focus on the story campaign, but did a good job on the ship control capabilities and real-time tactical battles.

item.title: Oxygen Not Included
item.description: Game Description The player’s task inOxygen Not Included is to obtain food, water, oxygen, valuable resources and happiness for the duplicates - the inhabitants of his colony. The world settled into different parts, because of this, half of the people went to other planets, and the second part called themselves duplicates and decided to travel through space, flying between asteroids. The idea of ​​the most hardcore survival simulator in a strategic shell - Oxygen Not Included - shows that maintaining your own base and several people on it is incredibly difficult.

item.title: Pixark
item.description: Game Description Pixark is made in the style of the famous Maycraft, but the game has a good plot, which is revealed in different ways for each player. The world of wildlife includes more than 100 different creatures that we can clone, tame and use for our own purposes. Among them will be friendly inhabitants of the jungle, as well as aggressive representatives of the game world. The mysterious lands made in the form of cubes are destroyed and built every minute.

item.title: MORDHAU
item.description: Game Description MORDHAU is a hack and slash game. Fights take place online on the company’s servers; offline you can train your skills in fights against artificial intelligence. A training session is also available, in which you will learn the basic mechanics and get your initial gold capital. The name refers to a special German grip on the weapon, which, by the way, is available for selection. The main, but not the only feature is a fencing system that is as close to reality as possible, created through consultations with experts.

item.title: Dawn of Man
item.description: Game Description A city planning simulator, civilization development and real-time strategy - Dawn of Man is one of the few games in the genre where human survival is presented in this form. For example, we start playing on behalf of the leader of a primitive tribe, and we need to get people to collect resources. Due to constant work, the brain begins to improve, and the first people appear in the world who think more or less intelligently.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay ofSpace Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Metro Exodus: Gold Edition
item.description: Game Description The events ofMetro Exodus - a first-person shooter with elements of stealth and horror - take place in the same areas as the previous parts. The Russian Federation and the Republic of Kazakhstan are still waging a fierce war for life inside, in underground territories, with representatives of hostile clans, factions and monsters who devour, rather than kill, their prey. Artyom leaves the Order after the battle for D6.

item.title: Resident Evil 2 Remake
item.description: Game Description RESIDENT EVIL 2 / BIOHAZARD RE:2 - a complete rework, allowing players to enjoy modern graphics, a new engine, enemies, weapons and a much more advanced game story. Follow the story of police officer Leon S. Kennedy and student Claire Redfield. Due to an unknown outbreak of a virus, the entire city of Raccoon City was enveloped in monsters, people began to turn into strange creatures, and then kill the survivors.

item.title: ATLAS
item.description: Game Description Embark on a grand adventure as a pirate and explore the islands. ATLAS is a sandbox role-playing game in which players can do whatever they want. Travel the islands with hundreds of other players, fight with them or join alliances. Create the ship of your dreams. More than a hundred different materials, many types of rafts and additions to the ship. Set up a flag, cannons, a mast, a rudder and hire a crew.

item.title: Penkura
item.description: Game Description Penkura combines several genres: action, adventure, RPG and strategy. Gamers find themselves in a unique world where they have to survive and thrive in an alien environment. The title begins with users traveling through an ancient singularity and landing on the distant world of Karenos. Here they will have to collect resources, explore ancient ruins and build a base that will help them cope with the upcoming trials. The combination of different gameplay styles creates an atmosphere that requires strategic thinking and adaptation at every turn.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: DayZ
item.description: Game Description The multiplayer sandboxDayZ is a reworked version of the mod of the same name for Arma 2. The game is distinguished by its extremely realistic setting and hardcore survival in a post-apocalyptic environment. The game takes place in the fictional post-Soviet country of Chernarus. After the outbreak of an unknown virus, most of the population has turned into zombies, and the survivors are forced to fight for their lives and valuable resources.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crows
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Two Crowns is a cooperative microstrategy that tells about the brave, who has become a king and now he needs to gather his army. Having saddled the right horse, he goes on a long journey to expand the kingdom. He will be opposed by the army of greed, trying to take everything from him that he has set up with his own labor. The game offers to rush not only in European medieval landscapes, but also to see many radically new ones.

item.title: Obenseuer
item.description: Game Description Obenseuer offers to manage a poor person who is trying to stay afloat and cope with psychological and financial problems. The protagonist is forced to collect bottles, mushrooms and turnips in order to somehow survive. The hero suffers from depression. He also has an alcohol and nicotine addiction. The main character needs to satisfy his needs, and also not forget about the rent. The events take place in the Obenseuer area.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Granny
item.description: Game Description Granny is a first-person horror game in which you visit granny’s house. It is located far from civilization. However, the trip does not end entirely well. You find yourself locked in the mansion of a distraught old lady. You have five days to find a way to leave this damned place. Do you think you can do it?.. The old woman locks you in a dark basement, after hitting you on the head.

item.title: Among Us
item.description: Game Description Among Us (Among As) is a multiplayer game designed for 4 to 10 people on the server at the same time for exciting gameplay with a variety of scenarios. The setting of the project is boundless outer space, in which maps with different structures of surrounding objects are located. Casual controls and the ability to play on a local network in cross-platform mode make it possible to invite a noisy group to spend time together on the Among Us project.

item.title: The Colonists
item.description: Game Description The Colonists are a urban planning sandbox in which you control a team of robots that create themselves. In the game you do not have to fight or kill enemies. The plot side of the project is meditative. You are landing on the planet, begin to carry out non -difficult tasks in which you need to build a settlement, and then improve your town depending on the preferences. Also in the game there is a “free mode” - here you make an island yourself, plant robots, begin to build a city from the resources obtained.

item.title: RimWorld
item.description: Game Description A simulator of city planning and strategic base development on a planet unknown to the player. The player inRimWorld must build a base where the last forces of people are concentrated. To survive, get food, study the technology tree and understand what the planet wants from you is the main task of the player. The project itself is characterized by the enormous depth of built mechanics that you can apply to your buildings and the base as a whole.

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: Mist Survival
item.description: Game Description Another survival game among zombies is Mist Survival. A completely open world, a unique system of characteristics, new types of weapons, shelters and the ability to create their own gang, attracted new players to fight on an open map against the crowd of enraged people absorbed in the epidemic. The main character, like all real players, will be protected from the epidemic, because in their body there is a special hormone that needs to be nourished every day.

item.title: FAR: Lone Sails
item.description: Game Description A simulator of controlling a unique ship in a platformer - FAR: Lone Sails - allows you to explore all the land on Earth after the apocalypse. The plot tells very little about the ship itself, but we understand that the owner of the ship several times cut out, changed, and improved the ship so that it could travel unhindered through the desert. The gameplay consists of us moving the ship around locations, but not forgetting about the character inside it.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: Basingstoke
item.description: Game Description Basingstoke is an action-adventure roguelike with stealth elements that is used in specific locations to achieve a goal set by the developers from a small indie team. The arcade controls and fast-paced gameplay work well together to entice more people to try Basingstoke. The gamer will have to explore the ruins of the fictional world of the same name, created specifically based on the real Great Britain. The universe is inhabited by giant hordes of monsters and ravaged by alien invasions, which has had a detrimental effect on the prospects for further growth of the local inhabitants.

item.title: Frostpunk
item.description: Game Description Frostpunk is an economic strategy game, a simulator of city construction in extremely harsh climatic conditions, where there are no wars, but there is a main enemy in the form of global cooling. The employees of the main office of 11 bit studios worked on the creation of this project. The official release of the game took place in April 2018. In technical terms, we have a three-dimensional strategy game, with a top-down view, a simulator of the leader of a surviving human population in the Arctic cold.

item.title: Far Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Finally, the plot ofFar Cry 5 has reached America. Crazed fanatics unleashed their might on the state of Montana. A first-person shooter with action elements brings us to a reality in which even the movements of dogs will be more than real. The modernization of the shooter took several years, so the development studio warns us in advance that the game is based on religious motives. Age limit: 18+.

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Subnautica
item.description: Game Description In the world ofSubnautica, your ship has crashed in an oceanic area, and there is only one straight line - down to the bottom. The landscapes around you are illuminated by the sun, the coral reefs shimmer beautifully under the sun as you slowly sink towards the endless darkness of space. Exploring a huge open world allows you not only to plunge under the water and look at the inhabitants of this ocean, but also to build your own underwater base there and build a research center on it.

item.title: StationEers
item.description: Game Description Stationeers will transfer the player to outer space, in which it is necessary to control the space station alone or with other participants. You will follow all aspects of the station. Manage and deal with complex atmospheric, electric, production, medical and other equally important technologies inside a large room. You will need to correctly build mechanisms and other objects to create a beautiful architecture, and also not to die due to a lack of oxygen or an excess of electricity.

item.title: Escape from Tarkov
item.description: Game Description Escape from Tarkov, a first -ized shooter with the first person with RPG and MMO elements, is one of the few games in which the plot is transmitted on the basis of a fictional conflict, but real interests. On the territory of Tarkov, in the Norvinsky region, there is a war between the soldiers of the USEC and Bear. Our hero is a simple soldier who is trying to get out of Tarkov at all costs, but for this he has to get acquainted with the same survivors after the conflict, try to survive and grab something valuable with him.

item.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
item.description: Game Description The world ofARK: Survival Evolved is a setting full of dangers, in which not only dinosaurs, but also other creatures will try to kill you. People become especially dangerous. The game does not have any interesting plot, but there is a huge open world in which you have to build your base, hunt with a group of people (your friends), attack, defend, make weapons and explore the area. This is a full-fledged survival simulator from the first person (possibly from the 3rd person), where survival is limited to a base with a fire.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: Brigand: Oaxaca
item.description: Game Description Brigand: Oaxaca is a first -person shooter hybrid, immersive simulator and role -playing game. The project has three -dimensional low -polygonal graphics. Due to her, the title resembles computer action of the late 90s and early 2000s. The action takes place in a world where nuclear apocalypse happened. Events unfold on the territory of the Mexican state of Ohak. Indi-game combines elements of different settings. In it, the gunshot weapons are adjacent to Voodoo magic, and not only mutters, but also demons roam the wastelands.

item.title: Unturned
item.description: Game Description Unturned combines a zombie-player and a sandbox with survival elements. In the single, the user studies locations, destroys the undead, looking for a useful lutus. In the multiplayer, the user is engaged in about the same, but also fights with living opponents. There is also a separate regime of the royal battle. Players who kill other gamers for no reason become bandits. You can become a hero, having taken up the shooting of criminals.

item.title: Colony Survival
item.description: Game Description Colony Survival is a unique first-person sandbox strategy game developed by a team of just two people! Build your own colony in the open world. Command guardsmen, farmers, miners and other colonists. Protect your colony from monsters that raid every night! Build bridges, tunnels, stairs and underground passages to make sure your colonists get where they want to go and the monsters don’t! As your colony grows, the number of monsters around will also increase.

item.title: Friday the 13th: The Game
item.description: Game Description Friday The 13th: The Game is a horror with a third -person view, where the player will test the role of the victim or become a maniac. 7 people try to survive and escape from Jason Wurchis. The game takes place in a small town near the forest. You can hide in houses, hide in the foliage, but the inexorable killer will still overtake you. The main goal is to get out of the damned place by leading the engine of the car or calling the police.

item.title: Bendy and the Ink Machine
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact that Bendy and the Ink Machine is a horror game with quite interesting graphics that keep you in the atmosphere even after beating the game, the developers manage to create a plot and a general feeling of fear through non-standard decisions regarding scares. We play as Henry Stein, who used to work as a cartoonist. One day he receives an invitation to the studio where he has been working for the last few years.

item.title: Rain World
item.description: Game Description Rain World is a conceptually original indie video game created by just 4 people. Brings something new to the platformer genre, focusing on hardcore. You take control of an unusual creature - a slugcat. He had not yet grown up, and always lived under the supervision of adults. But an unfortunate incident occurs, and the protagonist ends up in the industrial areas of the city, where his race obtains provisions.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
item.description: Game Description The open world of the new part -Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands - truly inspires what the developers tried to convict all players of. It must be said, but there is no plot in a third-person shooter. You independently write the story of your team, which is initially aimed at destroying the cartel that trades and produces drugs. But more on that later. First, it’s worth discussing the inner world of Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands.

item.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild
item.description: Game Description The Hunter’s Open World is now available intheHunter: Call of the Wild. This is not a simple hunter simulator, where we will have to climb trees and hide in the grass to kill the next deer, but a full-fledged world with smells, changing wind and weather; with the individual behavior of each animal that must be killed to complete the task. This is not a simple hunt, but a real one!

item.title: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 7: Biohazard is a survival horror game that continues the famous series of games, one of the founders of the genre. The release is timed to coincide with the twentieth anniversary of the universe. An option is available to play using a virtual reality helmet and control of special complete controllers from VR glasses. The seventh part was a return to the roots of the first games in the series, because, unlike parts 5 and 6, which were focused on action, shooting and the plot taking place in different parts of the world, this project has the main location in the form of a small estate of the Baker family, which gives the atmosphere is claustrophobic and increases the degree of fear.

item.title: ASTRONER
item.description: Game Description New resources inASTRONEER are presented in the form of any discovery on other planets, and everything that a person could bring with him after a galactic expedition was bought up at a clean price. There was an explosion in the world. Humanity is again hunting for “gold”, sending its compatriots into space. However, in the 25th century, when humanity has fully explored space, they send people to distant planets, where all that is known is that the planets are just as round.

item.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is a tactical stealth action game set in the Japanese Edo era (1603-1868). A conspiracy led by Kage-sama is carried out against the new shogun, after he was able to unite the lands of Japan. In order not to destroy the world, the ruler instructs his henchman samurai named Mugen to track down Kage-sama and his organization. For these purposes, the hero enlists the support of four companions - masters of secrecy and penetration.

item.title: Killing Floor 2
item.description: Game Description A cooperative first-person shooter in which there are only two modes - survival and battle in the territory. Killing Floor 2 does not have a plot, but there is sharp FPS on several maps, where each player chooses the desired role for himself - a zombie or a department fighting an epidemic. In addition to the fact that the gameplay differs on both sides of the barricades, players can buy additional weapons, make skins and show who can stand up best on the map.

item.title: Niche - a genetics survival game
item.description: Game Description Genetic survival game Niche - a genetics survival game will allow you to deal with the population of special foxes. To survive, you need to collect edible plants or hunt very nimble game that brings a large supply of meat. The gameplay feature is the gene. The game allows you to experiment with DNA and pair a dominant gene with a recessive one, and then observe the result. Then find a new nest of other creatures and hatch completely new individuals.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description Travel on an intergalactic level has become too simple and ordinary. It’s becoming increasingly difficult to create a game that captivates with its graphics, but the developers ofNo Man’s Sky, an indie adventure game with an open world and a wonderful RPG base, were able to recreate the image of space. Distant, limitless, completely open and so human. We play as a character, but then our gameplay switches to an entire space station or ship.

item.title: Starbound
item.description: Game Description Starbound is a 2D side-scrolling indie RPG adventure with graphics that reference the classic 8-bit titles of the last century. The project has become widespread thanks to the ability to play with a friend in co-op mode on different platforms, as well as a well-developed system of achievements and rewards that motivate you to improve your own skills and collect all kinds of items for crafting and collecting. The surrounding world is presented in the form of open territories, where there are no prohibitions on colonizing unknown planets or performing secondary tasks; you can even not touch the story campaign at all.

item.title: Death Road to Canada
item.description: Game Description Death Road to Canada is a zombie apocalypse game. It differs from other projects on this topic in its gameplay and humor. It’s a mixture of beat ‘em up and roguelike. The premise here is simple: in the USA, the dead began to rise from their graves and eat living people. After which their victims were also resurrected. The remainder of the population decided to move to Canada because this country was not affected by the epidemic.

item.title: Dead Age
item.description: Game Description Dead Age has an excellent and non-linear story, consisting of many choices that lead to 6 different endings. You will have to carefully study the text of the tasks, otherwise the members of your squad of survivors will inexorably dwindle. The point of the game is to survive as many days as possible, replenishing food supplies, tools and new survivors. But don’t think that everything is so simple, in addition to collecting, the game has daily events that will fill your every new day in the game with various difficulties or opportunities.

item.title: Dead by Daylight
item.description: Game Description Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical cooperative horror game inspired by youth slashers. The story centers on four survivors facing off against a fifth player who controls a bloodthirsty maniac. The defending team’s job is to do everything possible to ensure they aren’t dead by dawn. Finding yourself in the same location with the killer, you need to use the environment and interact with your partners, trying to resist the monster.

item.title: Wayward
item.description: Game Description Survive in the wild in Wayward, traveling around the open world. The protagonist has no basic specialization, as he passes, he pumps skills and becomes capable of everything. To get new characteristics, you have to interact with objects and the world around you. You have the opportunity to play as you want. The world is endless and generated randomly. Objects, chests, opponents, dangers, dungeons and tasks are also created by chance.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: UnReal World
item.description: Game Description The plot of UnReal World takes place in the early period of the Iron Age in the northern regions of Europe, and more precisely in the territory of modern Finland. The game is a life simulator, and therefore does not have a main plot - the player gets complete freedom of action and determines the fate and career of the character under his care. The game’s mechanics focus on survival aspects.

item.title: Dying Light: The Following
item.description: Game Description Dying Light: The Following provides the players with an extensive game world, a large arsenal of weapons, modifications, secondary and plot tasks, as well as dozens of gameplay hours. Visit in the post-apocalyptic world, teeming zombies and other bloodthirsty creatures in the action of the first person. Pour blood in epic battles! Use dozens of ways to kill zombies, as well as interact with surrounding objects that allow the enemies to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task inRise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER – third-person survival horror, re-released with new, higher-quality texture resolution and improved animation and lighting. A “Wesker Mode” with another playable character has also been added. The number zero in the title means that the story told in this part is a prequel to the first part of the legendary series, which spawned many projects in a single universe and created a real fashion for zombies and horror films with elements of survival.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives. But one day the spaceship crashed, and the robots around went crazy.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on whichThe Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Fallout 4
item.description: Game Description Fallout 4 is a sequel to the famous role-playing game series in a post-apocalyptic setting. The player wakes up from cryosleep and discovers that he is the only survivor of Vault 111. Having made it to the surface, he finds himself in the Wasteland - a world destroyed by nuclear war. The gameplay includes: a free open world with hundreds of locations to explore, a huge number of NPCs, companions and quests, as well as interaction with many factions, including the Institute, the Brotherhood of Steel, the Minutemen and agents of the Underground; S.

item.title: Waste Walkers
item.description: Game Description Waste Walkers sets us in the harsh reality of a world ravaged by war, nuclear holocaust and societal collapse. Set in the near future, it features a landscape where survival depends on ingenuity. Humanity’s struggle to survive takes place in a crumbling society where bandits, mutated creatures and an unforgiving environment pose a constant threat. In this world of scavenger hunts and crafts, players navigate a city plagued by horrors, trying to stay one step ahead of those who want to take away what little they have.

item.title: Zombie Army Trilogy
item.description: Game Description Zombie Army Trilogy - this game is a collectible gaming collection created in the style of a three -dimensional bloody shooter, which are narrated from a third -person. The plot of the game tells us about the resurrection of Hitler, who was aroused with the help of a deal with Satan. He begins to create an entire army of a zombie-soldier, which, after his death, are full of aggression, thirst for blood and revenge.

item.title: Forsaken Isle
item.description: Game Description Forsaken Isle is an adventure survival with a view of the top. You find yourself on a uninhabited island where you have to explore the surrounding territories, collect resources, build refuge and fight with a huge number of enemies. The main thing is to survive at all costs in the hostile environment of the forgotten island. Once alone with nature, you have to use all the skills to survive.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description A terrible virus grows into a global problem inDying Light. Starting from the city of Harran in Latin America, the infection is decimating the entire world, turning those infected into the walking dead. The hero must survive in such circumstances and try to correct the situation. As an undercover operative, Kyle Crane receives his most important assignment. He needs to find a guy named Suleiman in order to take away from him an important file that he stole.

item.title: Rising World
item.description: Game Description Rising World - a game in the “sandbox” genre. Your main goal is to survive in a world that you can create yourself. Explore caves, forests, mountains and dungeons. Develop new tools to solve problems and invent your powerful technologies. You can unite with other players to create civilization, trade and fight. This world is in your hands! Peculiarities: The modified world - everything you see can be changed.

item.title: Craft the World
item.description: Game Description Craft the World is an adventure 2D game that combines multiple elements. You can explore the procedurally generated worlds, build locks and fortresses, fight with hostile creatures and get materials necessary for numerous crafts. Manage the dwarf tribe and lead them the way you want. The player can send his wards to extract resources, build structures or fight with opponents. But, not everything is so simple. You have to put them on, help in battles and feed them in time.

item.title: Bloons TD 5
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 5 is one of many sequels to the series that uses tower defense mechanics. This franchise has more than 10 games in a shared universe; in addition to numbered parts, there are also separate spin-offs. The main goal is standard for the genre - to prevent opponents (in the case of this project, the antagonists are balls), attacking in waves, from crossing the line outside the screen; this is done with the help of towers that shoot at enemies and burst them in this way.

item.title: This War of Mine
item.description: Game Description This War of Mine is a cross-platform platformer game with elements of survival for an entire group of people. At the beginning of the game, you are given several characters to control the group, and you develop them depending on the time of day. During the day, the characters live in a house located in a city besieged by rebels. They arrange their everyday life, help each other, perform joint tasks and craft the necessary items.

item.title: Metro 2033 Redux
item.description: Game Description Metro 2033 Redux is a first-person shooter with a deep story and horror elements. The developers questioned not the simple existence of people underground, but the relationships between them. Has the main threat always been with us, in people? In the world of the post-apocalypse, we play as a character named Artem. He grew up underground, in the Moscow metro. In 2013, the world was hit by the terrible consequences of the latest epidemic.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: The Game. Season 2 – the continuation of the “Walking Dead” franchise does not lag behind the first part and begins its story 2 years after the previous events. Now in The Walking Dead: Season Two, the user plays as a 10-year-old girl, Clementine, who is once again trying to find shelter and survive in a mortal world filled with living corpses. Having lost all his old friends, a brave child begins a journey on his own.

item.title: Project Zomboid
item.description: Game Description Project Zomboid is a cross-platform game in which we will have to find a house, equip it, and start surviving in a world where a zombie apocalypse has recently occurred. We are located in Knox County. The latest epidemic infected more than 90% of the district’s residents, and they all became zombies. Difficult conditions will force us to survive, stock up on food, water, weapons and all available supplies in order to simply survive.

item.title: Contagion
item.description: Game Description Contagion - a fascinating zombie at the first person, created in the best traditions of action with a completely open world. The plot tells us about the world into which the virus penetrates and absorbs everyone without a trace. Everyone who fell under his actions turned into half -dead carcasses that crave blood. We take the role of the character, for the large -scale cleansing of human lands from the zombie.

item.title: Outlast (+Whistleblower)
item.description: Game Description Outlast (+Whistleblower) - DLC for the game of the same name, which added more content and a new storyline. The addition contains a backstory of the events that happened in the original, where Miles Upshur played the game. The journalist went to the Mount Massive mental hospital, where, for information received, there were many violations. Here he encountered a crowd of terrible psychos - monsters who had taken over the hospital.

item.title: Don't Starve
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve is an adventure arcade game in the action strategy genre with crafting elements. This game is an interesting survival simulator with a complete open game world. The plot tells us about the main character who was sailing on a ship and was shipwrecked. He woke up on an abandoned island. You will travel a lot through beautiful locations that were drawn by hand. Let’s begin to explore previously unknown living creatures and the remains of bygone times.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter -Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: FTL: Faster Than Light
item.description: Game Description FTL: Faster Than Light - this project is a two-dimensional simulator of a space combat ship. The creation and publication of this media product was carried out by the Subset Games studio. The official release took place in the first half of autumn 2012. The gameplay is based on the interaction between the player and the crew of the combat starship. The success of this space tactical strategy will depend on how successful this cooperation is.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season One
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: Season One is an interactive story divided into 6 episodes with elements of a point-n-click adventure and with QTEs in action scenes, telling the story of Lee Everett, a prisoner who was being transported in a police station when the zombie apocalypse began. car to another place of serving his sentence, but due to an attack on the vehicle by the dead, he managed to escape.

item.title: Dungeon Defenders
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Defenders is an interesting game that combines a huge number of different genres: action, strategy, role-playing, RPG. This game is initially designed for multiplayer connections. Before we start, we have to choose the most interesting character class, his equipment style and the color of the magic crystal. This item is the most vital for the hero; if its structure is disrupted, the character’s death may occur. There are many different types of improvements in the game: hero characteristics, crystals and passive abilities, and most importantly, basic combat spells.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.description: Game Description InLeft 4 Dead 2 we have a choice between 4 characters. The coach is a massive African American; Nick is an avid gambler, a trickster and a master of theft; Rochelle is a black 29-year-old Depeche Mode fan and journalist; Ellis is a racing fan and car enthusiast. The cooperative first-person shooter captivated many players for several years, providing ample ground for exterminating zombies in 5 game campaigns, which take place in swamps, cities, caves and closed locations.

item.title: Plants vs. Zombies GOTY Edition
item.description: Game Description Plants vs. Zombies became the game of the year, winning in many categories. The developers invite us to once again plunge into battles in a small location in order to free ourselves from the shackles of various zombies, hold back all the ardor of the monsters and save the city by using the latest technologies in the agricultural industry. Among the primary weapons in strategy, we have a pea shooter, a cherry bomb and sunflowers, which we use to earn money to purchase new strategic weapons.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 1
item.description: Game Description The first part ofLeft 4 Dead has 6 campaigns, several levels in each. The history and chronology of the chapters are interconnected, which will prevent the gamer from getting confused in the plot. At the beginning of each area, characters will appear at a checkpoint, where they can pick up weapons and ammunition and set off on their further journey. The United States of America has been gripped by an unknown virus that turns people into terrible monsters with bouts of aggression and rage.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment,Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: International Vending Machine
item.description: Game Description The International Vending Machine tells about a homeless girl who has found a strange apparatus. The device, located in a tight and buzzing space at the junction of the worlds, accepts Japanese yen, giving out objects from unknown times and realities in return. The exhausted heroine is forced to use it for the extraction of food. Any item obtained contradicts the laws of biology and logic, creating an oppressive atmosphere of mystery in its attempts to survive another night.

item.title: Blades of Fire
item.description: Game Description Blades of Fire offers to gamers to take on the role of Aran de Lira, who begins his way to find a true purpose. The Queen of Nereya turned steel into stone throughout the kingdom with her witchcraft. Only her army, consisting of abominations and undead, has a divine metal that can effectively resist any other armament. This mission leads Aran and his ADSO companion through the vast world, filled with dangers, deep secrets and various locations, such as huge castles and labyrinths of palaces.

item.title: Machine Mind
item.description: Game Description Machine Mind places the player in the role of consciousness transferred to a mechanical shell after the crash of a spaceship. The existence of a gamer is limited by the world, a changed planetary virus and subsequent nuclear conflict - the cataclysm, which forced the remnants of civilization to hide at the orbital station. Managing a series of rovers, it is necessary to provide its survival on the surface of the planet, now inhabited by aggressive raiders.

item.title: Minecraft for Windows - Bedrock Edition
item.description: Game Description Minecraft for Windows - Bedrock Edition - a procedurally generated sandbox, in which players are able to create unique cubic worlds. The card is divided into biomers. All areas are represented by an individual environment and climatic conditions. Deserts, mountains, plains, forests, ponds, etc. are available. In Minecraft for Windows - Brap of Edisen, you can switch between the first and third parties. The whole world consists of blocks.

item.title: Resident Evil
item.description: Game Description Survival in Resident Evil among zombies and mutants. The story tells us about a police officer who finds himself at the center of a global zombie apocalypse. The player will have to explore an old mansion, near which an entire squad of the special S.T.A.R.S unit disappeared. The gameplay of Resident Evil is about surviving in an estate full of zombies and mutated creatures, solving the mystery of this ancient building and trying to find at least one survivor from the previous special team.

item.title: Ancient Cits
item.description: Game Description Ancient Cits - a strategic game based on survival and construction mechanics. The game transfers in ancient times when people lived in tribes and built the first settlements. Plunge in prehistoric times and find the primitive life of our ancestors and their ancient cities. Events develop in the era of mesolithic. Draw your settlers through a whole generation, improving technologies, mastering new tools, engaged in resources, developing the population and fighting external threats.

item.title: Caravanners
item.description: Game Description Caravanners is an open-world survival game with the ability to customize vehicles. The action takes place in a post-apocalyptic world. The main character is a member of SUNK, a biological research company. The company’s centers are located in different parts of the world. You will need to explore vast territories, completing various main and secondary quests. Throughout the territory you need to collect various materials necessary for crafting. The world is on the verge of destruction, so resources in locations are strictly limited.

item.title: Dustland Delivery
item.description: Game Description Dustland Delivery puts users in the post -apocalyptic world, where they have to build an empire of delivery. The center of the game is profit, survival and strategic decisions. Gamers start with a truck and gain a team, each of which has unique skills. The purpose of the game? Build cities by successful delivery of goods, competing with rivals and overcoming dangers. The world is inexorable. Users move in an insidious area, control resources and make a critical choice.

item.title: Ells Tales: Chairbound
item.description: Game Description Ells Tales: Chairbound begins with the awakening of a character tied to an office chair in an empty room. A strange device with a 10-minute timer is attached to it, steadily counting time. The player’s main task is a desperate search for a way out of a closed corporate building. Movement is achieved by repulsion from surfaces - a method dictated by the physics of finding furniture with wheels, and the main difficulty is to maintain equilibrium.

item.title: From the Depths
item.description: Game Description From the Depths allows you to accept command of battleships, aircraft, submarines, space ships, balloons and many other modes of transport. The story campaign will visit more than a hundred lands and fight against 8 fractions. Misses consist in planning competent tactics and protecting your own fleet in a series of difficult tests. In addition to the main campaign, there is an adventure mode where it will be proposed to start the game alone on a small ship and grow to a whole fleet, furrows the expanses of the universe.

item.title: Good Heavens!
item.description: Game Description Good HEAVENS! It takes place in the Severe Kingdom of Xant-Rar, a bizarre afterlife, where souls live on floating islands. This songwriter with the open world allows gamers to pave their own path in the world, crowded with bizarre capabilities. Imagine: you have lived a good life, have left the earthly path and got into Xant -Rar - a place intended for the fulfillment of all your desires throughout eternity.

item.title: Ifsunsets
item.description: Game Description IFSUnsets is an adventure role -playing adventure for survival in which gamers fall into a complex situation. The game begins with the fact that users find themselves on the island after a shipwreck. This initial scenario lays the basis for research and survival. During the day, users can collect supplies and resources scattered across the island. This stage of collecting resources is very important for preparing for dangers that are hidden after sunset.

item.title: Mr. Nomad
item.description: Game Description Mr. Nomad immerses in a world, where survival depends on the only camp, serving as a mobile refuge. The main task is to build a fortified base around this van to reflect constant raids of the horde of zombies. The basis of gameplay is a two -level construction system that allows you to place ground fortifications and at the same time dig a safe bunker under them. This underground space serves as a protected area for growing a crop and storing valuable supplies far from external threats.

item.title: No Such Place
item.description: Game Description No Such Place is a tactical shooter in which agents of the Unknown Research Consortium (U.R.C.) organization are tasked with carrying out dangerous forays into anomalous zones. Operatives must penetrate unstable regions known as Dimensional Fragments, where the laws of physics and time gradually collapse. The main task becomes not only the destruction of supernatural threats, but also the collection of valuable information and resources before the area is completely erased from reality.

item.title: PANICORE
item.description: Game Description PANICORE throws you into a nightmare as an urban explorer. You and your friends, thrill-seekers who are attracted to creepy abandoned places, ignore the warnings and go to a creepy place. But the exploration takes a turn for the worse when you find yourself trapped. An unseen force is blocking the exit, and terrible creatures lurk in the shadows. Panic begins. You realize that you are not alone.

item.title: Road to Vostok
item.description: Game Description Road to Vostok is a journey into the heart of the exclusion zone located on the border between Finland and Russia, where every step could be your last. Survival here depends not on reaction speed, but on careful planning and preparation. The atmosphere of abandoned real locations permeates every element of the environment, making you constantly feel the tension and desolation of the post-apocalyptic world. Any mistake becomes fatal, and the price of a miscalculation is the irrevocable loss of everything achieved in a special zone with permanent death.

item.title: Soulmask
item.description: Game Description Soulmask is a mystical twist on the survival genre. Gamers eschew the usual “rags” and instead awaken clutching an ancient mask after a near-death experience. This relic is more than just a creepy wall decoration, it’s a game changer. Angry weather and wild animals won’t be your only problem. Soulmask features a vast open world that you must navigate in order to survive. Gathering resources is a must, but you can’t do it alone.

item.title: Terratech Worlds
item.description: Game Description In TerRatech Worlds, you will plunge with your head in a PVE survival with the open world on the mysterious planet of aliens. Put your way as a free prospector, exploring an extensive environment with an area of ​​300 km² with a variety of bioms, dynamic weather and a day/night cycle. To confront the hostile flora and fauna, rival fractions and insidious areas - and at the same time use the power of the planet in their interests.

item.title: Under a New Sun
item.description: Game Description Under a New Sun begins after a catastrophic failure of the ship, who left the player on an unknown planet. Awakening from cryosn occurs among fragments, completely solitude under a stranger sky. The mission to search for a new house for humanity failed, and the fate of the crew remains a mystery. The path begins in the middle of the wreckage of the vessel, in a world where the earthly flora has taken roots next to local views.

item.title: Wanderburg
item.description: Game Description Wanderburg is an open-world roguelike that places gamers at the center of a brutal ecosystem where entire castles on wheels move across procedurally generated lands. Each such stronghold is a predator, preying on weaker competitors and absorbing everything in its path for its own strengthening. The setting is filled with anachronistic technology, such as knights on motorcycles and steam-powered siege engines, which creates a unique atmosphere of the absurd Middle Ages.
